(3)(+0000000): ITEM CSL_CITATION {"citationID":"MFGgZDMv","properties":{"formattedCitation":"(\\uc0\\u26472{}\\uc0\\u33738{}\\uc0\\u21326{}, 2022; \\uc0\\u26690{}\\uc0\\u19990{}\\uc0\\u21195{}, 2022)","plainCitation":"(杨菊华, 2022; 桂世勋, 2022)","noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":9114,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/65BJQFV6"],"itemData":{"id":9114,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"由于受新中国成立后第二次出生人口数高峰期的影响，在2021—2039年我国将逐渐出现60—69岁低龄老年人口数高峰期，其峰值之高和延续时间之长空前绝后，并将产生一系列后续影响，从而给我们实施积极应对人口老龄化的国家战略带来严峻挑战。而对这一重要特点，各级政府和社会尚未给予高度关注。有鉴于此，应倡导被国际社会接受的“积极老龄化”理念，以及被列入我国加强新时代老龄工作指导思想的老年人“社会参与”。进一步而言，促进老年人以各种方式“参与”不仅是“积极老龄化”的主要内容，而且老年人适度“参与”有利于增进健康。尤其是低龄老年人的适度“参与”不仅有利于他们以各种方式对经济和社会发展继续作贡献，而且极大有利...","container-title":"华东师范大学学报(哲学社会科学版)","DOI":"10.16382/j.cnki.1000-5579.2022.04.015","ISSN":"1000-5579","issue":"4","language":"zh-CN","note":"<北大核心, CSSCI>","page":"145-152+179","source":"CNKI","title":"高度关注低龄老人适度“参与”对健康老龄化的影响","volume":"54","author":[{"literal":"桂世勋"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2022"]]}}},{"id":9231,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/52UQAL2L"],"itemData":{"id":9231,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"人是积极老龄化的根本保障。以长者的主体性和生产性切入，系统阐述新时代积极应对人口老龄化国家战略的必要性、可能性与可行性。结果发现，长者自身“不服老”的积极老龄观及其依旧较好的健康状况、持续改善的资本禀赋等，奠定了积极老龄化的主客观基础，而积极看待的价值定位、积极对待的战术谋划与行动策略，是将可能化为可行的重要推力与保障。推进积极老龄化国家战略，须接受老龄人口“爆炸”这一新的人口形态，克服焦虑与消极心态，突出“积极”意蕴；须以当期—发展的双重动态视角或战略眼光，重新认识长者，剥离贴在他们身上的贬损标签；须以常态之心，加强理论探索和学术研究，思考积极应对的行动策略与老龄社会的治理之策，为积极老龄化...","container-title":"中共中央党校(国家行政学院)学报","DOI":"10/gqzq5t","ISSN":"1007-5801","issue":"3","language":"zh_CN","note":"<北大核心, CSSCI>","page":"61-72","source":"CNKI","title":"积极应对人口老龄化：何以可能与何以可为","volume":"26","author":[{"literal":"杨菊华"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2022"]]}}}],"schema":"https://github.com/citation-style-language/schema/raw/master/csl-citation.json"}

(3)(+0000001): ITEM CSL_CITATION {"citationID":"Q5cmNGcy","properties":{"formattedCitation":"(\\uc0\\u19975{}\\uc0\\u23195{}\\uc0\\u23195{} \\uc0\\u31561{}, 2021; \\uc0\\u23020{}\\uc0\\u29577{}, 2022)","noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":8436,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/JNPVX863"],"itemData":{"id":8436,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"目的采用结构方程模型,以路径分析法探讨休闲参与、社会支持对老年忧郁及幸福感的影响。方法以休闲参与、社会支持、忧郁、幸福感量表为工具,对重庆市部分老年群体展开问卷调查,并运用探索性（EFA）与验证性（CFA）因素相结合的方法对回收问卷进行统计处理。结果休闲参与对老年忧郁不仅有直接负向影响,还可通过社会支持中介变量间接影响老年忧郁,表现为休闲参与越高的老年人其忧郁程度越低。社会支持对老年忧郁有直接负向影响,即社会支持越高的老年人其忧郁程度越低。休闲参与对老年幸福感有直接正向影响,还可通过社会支持和忧郁两个中介变量影响其幸福感,表现为休闲参与越高其幸福感越好。社会支持对老年幸福感有直接正向影响,还可通过忧郁中介变量影响老年幸福感,表现为社会支持越高其幸福感越好。结论影响老年忧郁及幸福感的因素众多,而社会支持是降低老年人忧郁及提升其幸福感的关键因子。","container-title":"中国老年学杂志","ISSN":"1005-9202","issue":"6","language":"zh-CN","note":"<北大核心>","page":"1460-1466","source":"CNKI","title":"休闲参与、社会支持对老年忧郁及幸福感的影响","volume":"39","author":[{"literal":"姬玉"},{"literal":"罗炯"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2019"]]}}},{"id":9260,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/DIKXY2IM"],"itemData":{"id":9260,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"目的:了解退休老年群体劳动参与行为对其健康状况的影响。方法:利用2011年、2013年、2015年中国健康与养老追踪调查(CHARLS)全国数据,以报告已办理退休手续的1 757名60岁及以上老年人作为研究对象,使用倾向得分匹配法研究退休后劳动参与行为对健康的影响。结果:劳动参与对退休老年群体自评健康、日常生活能力及慢性病患病情况的平均处理效应分别为0.099、0.324和0.562,存在正向促进作用且效应具有显著性;而对认知功能、抑郁情绪及生活满意度的作用则并不显著。结论:总体而言,劳动参与行为不会对退休老年群体的健康状况产生显著负面影响,且在一定程度上对提升退休老年群体的自评健康、日常生活...","container-title":"中国卫生政策研究","ISSN":"1674-2982","issue":"1","language":"zh_CN","note":"<北大核心, CSCD>","page":"59-65","source":"CNKI","title":"劳动参与对退休老年群体健康的影响研究","volume":"14","author":[{"literal":"万媛媛"},{"literal":"曾雁冰"},{"literal":"方亚"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2021"]]}}},{"id":9229,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/2CRU7CK4"],"itemData":{"id":9229,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"心理健康是健康老龄化的重要内容，而作为老年人度过晚年生活的主要生活来源，代际支持和劳动参与对老年心理健康有不可忽视的作用。基于2015年中国健康与养老追踪调查数据(CHARLS),讨论了劳动参与和代际支持对老年心理健康的影响。在控制社交生活、人口统计学特征等其他因素的情况下，回归结果表明：劳动参与对老年心理健康影响较大，且不同种类的劳动参与对老年心理健康的影响不同；在代际支持中，非同住子女的经济和情感支持对老年心理健康有显著的正向影响，与子女同住则不利于缓解老人抑郁。且代际支持与劳动参与影响老年心理健康的机制不同，代际支持主要通过调节消极情绪发挥作用，而劳动参与同时通过消极情绪和积极情绪产生影...","container-title":"人口与发展","ISSN":"1674-1668","issue":"3","language":"zh_CN","note":"<北大核心, 老年人的社会适应状况最好且没有显著差异。社会参与模式与社会适应的关系存在显著城乡差异。研究结果表明,应保障老年人社会参与的权利,丰富社会参与的途径和内容,促进老年人在个人生活和家庭生活中参与的平衡,以增强其适应社会发展变化的能力。","container-title":"人口研究","ISSN":"1000-6087","issue":"5","language":"zh-CN","note":"<北大核心, CSSCI>","page":"49-63","source":"CNKI","title":"中国老年人社会参与模式及其对社会适应的影响","volume":"45","author":[{"literal":"谢立黎"},{"literal":"王飞"},{"literal":"胡康"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2021"]]}}},{"id":5666,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/H5DN6ARD"],"itemData":{"id":5666,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"文章使用2014年中国老年社会追踪调查数据,根据老年人参加经济活动、社会活动、政治活动和家庭活动的情况,利用潜在类别模型探索老年人的社会参与模式,并从个人、社会、经济和环境4个方面分析影响老年人社会参与模式的因素。研究发现,老年人社会参与模式可以分为高参与型、低参与型和家庭照顾型,这一结果与我国重视家庭文化的特点相符。多分类Logistic模型结果验证了中国老年人社会参与模式影响因素理论框架的适用性。研究结果表明应通过发展终身教育,加强社会组织建设,完善养老服务体系,建立年龄友好环境,提高老年人社会参与的内外能力,尤其是关注弱势老年群体社会参与的需求,来真正建立一个人人共享的社会,从而推进和实现健康老龄化和积极老龄化。","container-title":"人口研究","ISSN":"1000-6087","issue":"3","language":"zh-CN","note":"<北大核心, CSSCI>","page":"17-30","source":"CNKI","title":"积极老龄化视野下中国老年人社会参与模式及影响因素","volume":"43","author":[{"literal":"谢立黎"},{"literal":"汪斌"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2019"]]}}},{"id":8119,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/49ZLMNF7"],"itemData":{"id":8119,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"老年人的社会参与既是社会经济发展的需要 ,又是自身安度幸福晚年的需要 ,也是老年人的权利。老年人口的社会参与包括参与社会经济发展活动、家务劳动、社会文化活动、人际交往、旅游活动和在家庭范围内参与文化娱乐活动。社会要为老年人实现社会参与创造条件。同时 ,要充分调动老年人社会参与的自觉性和积极性","container-title":"武汉大学学报(人文社会科学版)","ISSN":"1000-5374","issue":"1","language":"zh-CN","note":"<北大核心, CSSCI>","page":"61-65","source":"CNKI","title":"再论老年人口的社会参与","volume":"53","author":[{"literal":"杨宗传"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2000"]]}}},{"id":4579,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/QLXS868N"],"itemData":{"id":4579,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"利用第三期妇女地位调查数据,以城市中低龄老年人为分析对象,将老年人的社会参与活动划分为四种类型,对各种类型老年人的基本特征进行了分析,并使用Multi-logistic回归模型探讨了个人特征、健康状况、家庭情况、社会经济背景、社区环境等相关因素对老年人社会参与活动的影响。老年人的社会参与活动与个人、环境因素密切相关;健康是影响老年人参与各类活动的最重要变量,稳定和充足的经济收入是老年人社会参与的重要奈件;社区有无场地和居住时间长短均对老年人的社会参与有显著影响。","container-title":"人口与发展","ISSN":"1674-1668","issue":"1","language":"zh-CN","note":"<北大核心, CSSCI>","page":"78-88","source":"CNKI","title":"城市中低龄老年人的社会参与模式研究","volume":"21","author":[{"literal":"张文娟"},{"literal":"赵德宇"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2015"]]}}},{"id":7894,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/ERPZVVSA"],"itemData":{"id":7894,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"利用2018年中国健康与养老追踪调查（CHARLS）抽样调查数据,选取大于等于60岁的老年人作为研究对象,探索老年人多维度社会参与、家庭交往和抑郁情绪的关联,为改善老年人的心理健康提供依据。社会参与包括社会活动参与和经济参与,家庭交往包括对子女和配偶的满意度及交往程度。经对多因素logistic回归分析发现,社会参与维度上,社会活动参与中的老年人社交活动、体育锻炼是抑郁情绪的保护因素;经济参与层面上,对比无工作的老年人,从事农业劳动与老年人抑郁风险存在关联,老年人对工作的满意度较高与其抑郁风险降低有关;家庭交往维度上,对配偶、子女的满意度较高均与老年人的抑郁风险降低有关,此外,与子女同住或交往频繁的老年人,抑郁风险显著低于与子女不交往的老年人。研究结论:老年人的社会参与、家庭交往均和抑郁情绪之间存在关联。建议老年人应当多参加社交活动和体育锻炼,子女应对老人多一些陪伴,国家在延迟退休年龄的同时要关注老年人对工作的满意度,关注老年人的精神生活。","container-title":"人口与发展","ISSN":"1674-1668","issue":"3","language":"zh-CN","note":"<北大核心, CSSCI>","page":"110-122","source":"CNKI","title":"老年人多维度社会参与和家庭交往与抑郁情绪发生风险的关联研究","volume":"27","author":[{"literal":"赵涵"},{"literal":"向远"},{"literal":"裴丽君"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2021"]]}},"label":"page"}],"schema":"https://github.com/citation-style-language/schema/raw/master/csl-citation.json"}

(3)(+0000000): ITEM CSL_CITATION {"citationID":"0EX9jN8M","properties":{"formattedCitation":"(\\uc0\\u37101{}\\uc0\\u29233{}\\uc0\\u22969{}, \\uc0\\u39038{}\\uc0\\u22823{}\\uc0\\u30007{}, 2018)","plainCitation":"(郭爱妹, 顾大男, 2018)","noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":9625,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/NHJ9ABPJ"],"itemData":{"id":9625,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"随着人口预期寿命的延长及全球老龄化进程的加剧,如何促进老年人实现成功老龄化成为国内外学界及政策制定者所共同关注的重要议题。成功老龄化这一概念是由哈维伯斯特于1961年提出;1987年,约翰·罗和罗伯特·卡恩的成功老龄化理论将老龄化研究从疾病与衰减范式转变为健康与成长范式。在50多年的研究历程中,学术界形成了以下三种研究取向:即生物医学模式、心理社会模式以及生物心理社会模式,其研究议题和研究范畴也经历了从生物本质论到社会建构论、从客位视角到主位视角、从专家认知到常人认知、从健康老人到失能和困境老人的转变。未来的成功老龄化研究应重点致力于个体层面成功老龄化理论的完善和深化与研究方法论的变革,包括运用交错性范式与多元方法探讨不同性别、种族/民族、年龄、阶层、能力等多元老年群体经验,注重量化与质化研究、客位研究与主位研究的整合,使用生命历程理论探讨成功老龄化的动态发展历程;另一方面,应加强社会层面成功老龄化的研究,促进个体层面和社会层面的结合,从而推动我国成功老龄化研究的发展。","container-title":"南京师大学报(社会科学版)","ISSN":"1001-4608","issue":"3","language":"zh","page":"102-110","source":"CNKI","title":"成功老龄化:理论、研究与未来展望","title-short":"成功老龄化","author":[{"literal":"郭爱妹"},{"literal":"顾大男"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2018"]]}}}],"schema":"https://github.com/citation-style-language/schema/raw/master/csl-citation.json"}

(3)(+0000000): ITEM CSL_CITATION {"citationID":"4Xr1Yav2","properties":{"formattedCitation":"(Ortiz-Rubio et al., 2020; Yen et al., 2009; \\uc0\\u21016{}\\uc0\\u20113{}\\uc0\\u23077{} \\uc0\\u31561{}, 2014)","plainCitation":"(Ortiz-Rubio et al., 2020; Yen et al., 2009; 刘云娥 等, 2014)","noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":9665,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/IPE5TRWY"],"itemData":{"id":9665,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"目的翻译并修订Kogan老年态度量表(KAOP),并考察其心理测量学特征。方法使用翻译的中文版KAOP对465名注册护士进行问卷调查,检验其条目鉴别度、结构效度、信度等心理学测量学特征。结果因素分析共提取2个因子,累计方差贡献率为35.959%。内部一致性信度为0.788,消极分量表(OP-)的内部一致性信度为0.847,积极分量表(OP+)的内部一致性信度为0.804。重测信度为0.974。本研究修订的KAOP与原英文量表结构一致,内部一致性信度较好,重测信度高,跨时间稳定性较好。但与原量表相比,删除了部分条目,最终保留25个条目,使其更适应于目标人群。结论修订的KAOP量表具有较好的信效度,可用于评估护士对老年人的态度。","container-title":"中华护理杂志","ISSN":"0254-1769","issue":"11","language":"zh","page":"1294-1297","source":"CNKI","title":"中文版Kogan老年态度量表的修订研究","volume":"49","author":[{"literal":"刘云娥"},{"literal":"杨文丽"},{"literal":"马艳林"},{"literal":"Alison While"},{"literal":"叶文琴"},{"literal":"陈洁"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2014"]]}}},{"id":9639,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/T28EPT7W"],"itemData":{"id":9639,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"Population ageing is one of the present and future challenges in the European context. In addition to age-related changes, negative and judicious attitudes by society are also prevalent. Therefore, there is a need for reliable instruments to evaluate attitudes toward ageing. In this vein, the present research aims to provide a reliable version of the Kogan's Attitudes toward Older People scale adapted to the Spanish context. In a sample from the academic community (N = 163), we evaluated the reliability, the psychometric properties, and the internal consistency of a version of Kogan's scale translated into Spanish. The results showed a reliable short version of the scale with adequate psychometric properties and two factors: positive and negative. Moreover, the correlates with similar measures of attitude toward older people proved external validity measures by the short scale. The implications and contributions to the geriatric population are discussed.","call-number":"2","container-title":"Archives of Gerontology and Geriatrics","DOI":"10/grv35f","ISSN":"1872-6976","journalAbbreviation":"Arch Gerontol Geriatr","language":"en","note":"PMID: 32629373","page":"104159","source":"4.163","title":"Kogan's Attitude toward Old People scale revisited: Psychometric properties and recommendations","title-short":"Kogan's Attitude toward Old People scale revisited","volume":"90","author":[{"family":"Ortiz-Rubio","given":"Araceli"},{"family":"Lobato","given":"Roberto M."},{"family":"Valenza","given":"Marie Carmen"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2020"]]}}},{"id":9646,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/7W56V75Z"],"itemData":{"id":9646,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"Background\nTaiwan is facing the dilemma of a rapidly growing elderly population and there is a perceived need for greater gerontological education. Several universities have recently started providing elective gerontological certification programs. In order to provide useful and sufficient information to increase students’ knowledge and attitudes, to develop a reliable and valid instrument is essential and helpful for faculty as well as the program director to pinpoint students’ strengths and weaknesses.\nObjective\nTo assess the reliability and validity of a Chinese version of Kogan's Attitudes toward Older People (KAOP) among medical and nursing students at a medical university.\nMethod\nA two-phase data collection design was used. Two weeks following the first completion, another KAOP form, was given. Content validity, construct validity, internal consistency, and stability reliability were assessed. The final sample consisted of 275 students.\nResults\nScores were between 34 and 238. The study sample reported slightly positive attitudes (144.3±17.89), with half of the subjects (50.1%) above average. All of the 34 items were found to have significant item-to-total correlations (p<.05). Two factors were extracted, Appreciation and Prejudice. The Prejudice and Appreciation contributed 33.6% and 21.1% to the variance. The Cronbach's alpha was .82 for the total scale (.83 for Prejudice, .81 for Appreciation). Stability was 0.86 for Prejudice and 0.91 for Appreciation.\nConclusions\nThe Chinese version of the KAOP can be considered reliable and valid scale for assessing the attitudes toward older people.","call-number":"1","container-title":"International Journal of Nursing Studies","DOI":"10/b9x379","ISSN":"0020-7489","issue":"1","journalAbbreviation":"International Journal of Nursing Studies","language":"en","page":"38-44","source":"6.612","title":"A Chinese version of Kogan's Attitude toward Older People Scale: Reliability and validity assessment","title-short":"A Chinese version of Kogan's Attitude toward Older People Scale","volume":"46","author":[{"family":"Yen","given":"Chi-Hua"},{"family":"Liao","given":"Wen-Chun"},{"family":"Chen","given":"Yu-Ru"},{"family":"Kao","given":"Min-Chen"},{"family":"Lee","given":"Meng-Chih"},{"family":"Wang","given":"Cheng-Ching"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2009",1,1]]}}}],"schema":"https://github.com/citation-style-language/schema/raw/master/csl-citation.json"}

vo 10","language":"中文;","page":"28-41","title":"关于老化态度的概念界定、测量方法与干预机制","author":[{"family":"朱荟;马静婕","given":""}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2022"]]}}},{"id":9655,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/5P88EFJR"],"itemData":{"id":9655,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"The Attitude Toward Own Aging (ATOA) Scale assesses an individual’s evaluation of their own aging, and has been widely used in the field of subjective aging literature. The present study examined whether the ATOA scale measures the same construct across middle-aged (40–60), young-old (61–74), and old-old adults (ages 75 or older) and also evaluated the construct validity of the ATOA construct in relation to measures of subjective well-being. Data drawn from the 2008 wave of the German Aging Survey (DEAS; n = 6091) were used. ATOA was assessed by the ATOA subscale of the Philadelphia Geriatric Center Morale Scale (PGCMS), and subjective well-being was assessed with the Satisfaction with Life Scale (SWLS) and the Positive and Negative Affect Scale (PANAS). Confirmatory factor analysis revealed that the model fit of the one-factor model consisting of four items fits the data well. Multi-group invariance analyses provide evidence for configural and metric invariance of the ATOA scale across the age groups, but not for scalar invariance. Additional analysis assessing construct validity indicated that the ATOA items exhibited convergent validity. The findings support the utility of the 4-item scale when examining age group differences of ATOA across a wide age range and that ATOA is distinct from measures of subjective well-being.","container-title":"Journal of Adult Development","DOI":"10/gdjsb3","journalAbbreviation":"Journal of Adult Development","language":"en","source":"ResearchGate","title":"Attitude Toward Own Aging: Age Invariance and Construct Validity Across Middle-Aged, Young-Old, and Old-Old Adults","title-short":"Attitude Toward Own Aging","volume":"25","author":[{"family":"Jung","given":"Seojung"},{"family":"Siedlecki","given":"Karen"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2018",6,1]]}}}],"schema":"https://github.com/citation-style-language/schema/raw/master/csl-citation.json"}

(3)(+0000000): ITEM CSL_CITATION {"citationID":"pfT4aYdw","properties":{"formattedCitation":"(2018)","plainCitation":"(2018)","noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":9652,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/TQDNXB36"],"itemData":{"id":9652,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"Objectives: The original 24-item Attitudes to Ageing Questionnaire (AAQ) is well-established as a measure of attitudes to aging, comprising domains of Psychosocial Loss (PL), Physical Change (PC), and Psychological Growth (PG). This paper presents a new 12-item short form Attitudes to Ageing Questionnaire (AAQ-SF). Methods: The original field trial data used to develop the AAQ-24 were used to compare 6-,9- and 12-item versions of AAQ-SF (Sample 1, n = 2,487) and to test the discriminative validity of the selected 12-item AAQ-SF (Sample 2, n = 2,488). Data from a separate study reporting on the AAQ-24 (sample 3, n = 792) verified analyses. Results: The 12-item AAQ-SF reported adequate internal consistency in both Sample 1 (PL α = .72, PC α = .72, and PG α = .62) and Sample 3 (PL α = .68, PC α = .73, and PG α = .61). The AAQ-SF functioned consistently with the profile of the AAQ-24 in that subscales in both formats of this measure discriminate between respondents on key parameters such as depression, subjective health status, and overall quality of life in Sample 2. Sample 3 also demonstrated the AAQ-SF can detect the differences in attitudes toward aging between individuals experiencing anxiety and depression and those without psychological symptoms. Confirmatory Factor Analysis confirmed the structure of the AAQ-SF mirrors that of the original 24-item AAQ. Conclusions: The AAQ-SF is a robust measure of attitudes toward aging, which can reduce respondent burden when used within longer questionnaire batteries or longitudinal research.","call-number":"2","container-title":"International Journal of Geriatric Psychiatry","DOI":"10/gf896x","ISSN":"0885-6230","issue":"1","language":"en","page":"113-121","source":"3.85","title":"Development of a short form of the Attitudes to Ageing Questionnaire (AAQ)","volume":"33","author":[{"family":"Laidlaw","given":"Ken"},{"family":"Kishita","given":"Naoko"},{"family":"Shenkin","given":"Susan D."},{"family":"Power","given":"Michael J."}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2018",1]]}},"label":"page","suppress-author":true}],"schema":"https://github.com/citation-style-language/schema/raw/master/csl-citation.json"}

(3)(+0000000): ITEM CSL_CITATION {"citationID":"r4WUmlNj","properties":{"formattedCitation":"(1995)","plainCitation":"(1995)","noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":9677,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/884JR94P"],"itemData":{"id":9677,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"The AGED Inventory was designed to overcome shortcomings identified in the Aging Semantic Differential, a frequently used measure of how age groups are perceived. The new instrument was developed to allow assessment both of age stereotypes and of attitudes toward age-specified targets. The Inventory was developed with data from 300 male and 300 female respondents. Two seven-item evaluative factors (the Goodness and Positiveness dimensions) resulted from a series of factor analyses used to reduce an initial set of thirty-five evaluative adjective pairs. Two seven-item descriptive factors (the Vitality and Maturity dimensions) resulted from a separate series of factor analyses used to reduce an initial set of fifty adjective pairs judged to differentiate age groups. Using confirmatory factor analyses and coefficients of congruence on data from an additional 800 respondents, the factor structures of the two evaluative factors and of the two descriptive factors were found to be replicable for young, middle-aged, and old targets assessed in either between or within subject designs. Its ease of administration, multi-dimensionality, flexibility of targets specification, and capability for assessing attitude and/or stereotype in a manner congruent with current conceptualizations of these constructs make the AGED Inventory useful in a variety of contexts.","container-title":"The International Journal of Aging and Human Development","DOI":"10/dt8dgk","ISSN":"0091-4150, 1541-3535","issue":"1","journalAbbreviation":"Int J Aging Hum Dev","language":"en","page":"31-55","source":"DOI.org (Crossref)","title":"The Age Group Evaluation and Description (AGED) Inventory: A New Instrument for Assessing Stereotypes of and Attitudes toward Age Groups","title-short":"The Age Group Evaluation and Description (AGED) Inventory","volume":"40","author":[{"family":"Knox","given":"V. Jane"},{"family":"Gekoski","given":"William L."},{"family":"Kelly","given":"Lynn E."}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["1995",1]]}},"label":"page","suppress-author":true}],"schema":"https://github.com/citation-style-language/schema/raw/master/csl-citation.json"}

(3)(+0000000): ITEM CSL_CITATION {"citationID":"80jZPSWd","properties":{"formattedCitation":"(\\uc0\\u27494{}\\uc0\\u21073{}\\uc0\\u20521{}, \\uc0\\u38046{}\\uc0\\u31179{}\\uc0\\u29618{}, 2020)","plainCitation":"(武剑倩, 钞秋玲, 2020)","noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":9605,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/FWGPBD4B"],"itemData":{"id":9605,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"目的利用Meta分析探讨老年人老化态度的状况及影响因素。方法计算机检索中国知网、万方、PsycINFO等数据库,收集2010年01月～2019年12月发表的国内外老化态度的影响因素相关文献,使用RevMan 5.3软件进行Meta分析。结果共纳入以老化态度问卷(AAQ)为研究工具的文献20篇,总样本量11 854例。中国老年人和西方老年人在\"心理社会丧失\"、\"生理变化\"维度以及总体\"老化态度\"上的差异不显著(P> 0.05)。在\"心理获得\"维度上,中国老年人的心理获得水平低于西方老年人,差异有统计学意义(SMD=-0.28);中国超大城市老年人的心理获得水平高于特大城市和小城市的老年人。年龄、受教育程度、婚姻状况、收入水平、社会支持和人格对老化态度有不同程度的影响。老化态度对老年人的生理健康、心理健康、认知水平、社会参与、生活满意度和生活质量有系统影响。结论老化态度是影响老年人整体生活质量的重要因素,从社会支持、老年教育和心理服务等方面提高中国老年人的心理获得感,以促进老化态度积极正向发展。","container-title":"中华保健医学杂志","ISSN":"1674-3245","issue":"3","language":"zh","page":"115-118","source":"CNKI","title":"老年人老化态度影响因素的Meta分析","volume":"22","author":[{"literal":"武剑倩"},{"literal":"钞秋玲"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2020"]]}}}],"schema":"https://github.com/citation-style-language/schema/raw/master/csl-citation.json"}

(3)(+0000000): ITEM CSL_CITATION {"citationID":"UrpWskc0","properties":{"formattedCitation":"(2020)","plainCitation":"(2020)","noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":9605,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/FWGPBD4B"],"itemData":{"id":9605,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"目的利用Meta分析探讨老年人老化态度的状况及影响因素。方法计算机检索中国知网、万方、PsycINFO等数据库,收集2010年01月～2019年12月发表的国内外老化态度的影响因素相关文献,使用RevMan 5.3软件进行Meta分析。结果共纳入以老化态度问卷(AAQ)为研究工具的文献20篇,总样本量11 854例。中国老年人和西方老年人在\"心理社会丧失\"、\"生理变化\"维度以及总体\"老化态度\"上的差异不显著(P> 0.05)。在\"心理获得\"维度上,中国老年人的心理获得水平低于西方老年人,差异有统计学意义(SMD=-0.28);中国超大城市老年人的心理获得水平高于特大城市和小城市的老年人。年龄、受教育程度、婚姻状况、收入水平、社会支持和人格对老化态度有不同程度的影响。老化态度对老年人的生理健康、心理健康、认知水平、社会参与、生活满意度和生活质量有系统影响。结论老化态度是影响老年人整体生活质量的重要因素,从社会支持、老年教育和心理服务等方面提高中国老年人的心理获得感,以促进老化态度积极正向发展。","container-title":"中华保健医学杂志","ISSN":"1674-3245","issue":"3","language":"zh","page":"115-118","source":"CNKI","title":"老年人老化态度影响因素的Meta分析","volume":"22","author":[{"literal":"武剑倩"},{"literal":"钞秋玲"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2020"]]}},"label":"page","suppress-author":true}],"schema":"https://github.com/citation-style-language/schema/raw/master/csl-citation.json"}

(3)(+0000000): ITEM CSL_CITATION {"citationID":"ZjzX7wFR","properties":{"formattedCitation":"(2023)","plainCitation":"(2023)","noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":9701,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/SVZ3PLLL"],"itemData":{"id":9701,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"Objective\nTo determine whether self-perceptions of aging (SPA) predict physical resilience following a fall and whether SPA and physical resilience affect subsequent social engagement in older adults with a fall.\nDesign\nProspective cohort study.\nSetting\nGeneral community.\nParticipants\nOlder adults who reported a fall within 2 years after baseline data collection (n=1707, mean age 72.9 years, 60.9% women).\nMain outcome measure\nPhysical resilience indicates the ability to resist or recover from functional decline from a stressor. The change in frailty status from directly after the fall to up to two years of follow-up was used to generate four physical resilience phenotypes. Social engagement was dichotomized based on the presence at one of the five social activities at least once a month. The 8-item Attitudes Toward Own Aging Scale was used to assess SPA at baseline. Multinomial logistic regression and nonlinear mediation analysis were used.\nResults\nPositive prefall SPA predicted more resilient phenotypes after a fall. Both positive SPA and physical resilience affected subsequent social engagement. Physical resilience partially mediated the association between SPA and social re-engagement (mediated percentage of 14.5 %, P = 0.004). This mediation effect was fully driven by those with previous falls.\nConclusion\nPositive SPA promotes physical resilience in older adults with a fall, both of which affect subsequent social engagement. Physical resilience partially mediated the effect of SPA on social engagement but only for previous fallers. Multidimensional recovery incorporating psychological, physiological and social aspects should be stressed in the rehabilitation of older adults who fall.","call-number":"1","container-title":"Archives of Physical Medicine and Rehabilitation","DOI":"10/grv49b","ISSN":"0003-9993","journalAbbreviation":"Archives of Physical Medicine and Rehabilitation","language":"en","source":"4.06","title":"Positive self-perceptions of aging increase physical resilience to facilitate social re-engagement of older adults who fall: Analysis based on Health and Retirement Study data","title-short":"Positive self-perceptions of aging increase physical resilience to facilitate social re-engagement of older adults who fall","URL":"https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0003999323001065","author":[{"literal":"Zeyi Zhang"},{"literal":"Jingjing Wang"},{"literal":"Bin Ma"},{"literal":"Jingyi Wang"},{"literal":"Yuanmin Jia"},{"literal":"Ou Chen"}],"accessed":{"date-parts":[["2023",3,5]]},"issued":{"date-parts":[["2023",3,1]]}},"label":"page","suppress-author":true}],"schema":"https://github.com/citation-style-language/schema/raw/master/csl-citation.json"}

(3)(+0000000): ITEM CSL_CITATION {"citationID":"8S7IepTn","properties":{"formattedCitation":"(2002)","plainCitation":"(2002)","noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":9973,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/4AC756W9"],"itemData":{"id":9973,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"This article addresses the convergence and complementarity between self-regulatory control-process models of behavior and dynamic systems models. The control-process view holds that people have a goal in mind and try to move toward it (or away from it), monitoring the extent to which a discrepancy remains between the goal and one's present state and taking steps to reduce the discrepancy (or enlarge it). Dynamic systems models tend to emphasize a bottom-up self-organization process, in which a coherence arises from among many simultaneous influences, moving the system toward attractors and away from repellers. We suggest that these differences in emphasis reflect two facets of a more complex reality involving both types of processes. Discussion focuses on how self-organization may occur within constituent elements of a feedback system—the input function, the output function, and goal values being used by the system—and how feedback processes themselves can reflect self-organizing tendencies.","container-title":"Personality and Social Psychology Review - PERS SOC PSYCHOL REV","DOI":"10/c4sr97","journalAbbreviation":"Personality and Social Psychology Review - PERS SOC PSYCHOL REV","language":"en","source":"ResearchGate","title":"Control Processes and Self-Organization as Complementary Principles Underlying Behavior","volume":"6","author":[{"family":"Carver","given":"Charles"},{"family":"Scheier","given":"Michael"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2002",11,1]]}},"label":"page","suppress-author":true}],"schema":"https://github.com/citation-style-language/schema/raw/master/csl-citation.json"}

(3)(+0000000): ITEM CSL_CITATION {"citationID":"F0mNrMgb","properties":{"formattedCitation":"(2004)","plainCitation":"(2004)","noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":9968,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/V99PN37T"],"itemData":{"id":9968,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"What good is self-control? We incorporated a new measure of individual differences in self-control into two large investigations of a broad spectrum of behaviors. The new scale showed good internal consistency and retest reliability. Higher scores on self-control correlated with a higher grade point average, better adjustment (fewer reports of psychopathology, higher self-esteem), less binge eating and alcohol abuse, better relationships and interpersonal skills, secure attachment, and more optimal emotional responses. Tests for curvilinearity failed to indicate any drawbacks of so-called overcontrol, and the positive effects remained after controlling for social desirability. Low self-control is thus a significant risk factor for a broad range of personal and interpersonal problems.","container-title":"Journal of Personality","DOI":"10/ff93z5","ISSN":"0022-3506","issue":"2","journalAbbreviation":"J Pers","language":"en","note":"PMID: 15016066","page":"271-324","source":"PubMed","title":"High self-control predicts good adjustment, less pathology, better grades, and interpersonal success","volume":"72","author":[{"family":"Tangney","given":"June P."},{"family":"Baumeister","given":"Roy F."},{"family":"Boone","given":"Angie Luzio"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2004",4]]}},"label":"page","suppress-author":true}],"schema":"https://github.com/citation-style-language/schema/raw/master/csl-citation.json"}

(3)(+0000001): ITEM CSL_CITATION {"citationID":"svkRUhyt","properties":{"formattedCitation":"(2014)","plainCitation":"(2014)","noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":9982,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/46WYRPYM"],"itemData":{"id":9982,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"Self-control refers to the mental processes that allow people to override thoughts and emotions, thus enabling behavior to vary adaptively from moment to moment. Dominating contemporary research on this topic is the viewpoint that self-control relies upon a limited resource, such that engaging in acts of restraint depletes this inner capacity and undermines subsequent attempts at control (i.e., ego depletion). Noting theoretical and empirical problems with this view, here we advance a competing model that develops a non-resource-based account of self-control. We suggest that apparent regulatory failures reflect the motivated switching of task priorities as people strive to strike an optimal balance between engaging cognitive labor to pursue ‘have-to’ goals versus preferring cognitive leisure in the pursuit of ‘want-to’ goals.","call-number":"1","container-title":"Trends in Cognitive Sciences","DOI":"10/ggdgb4","ISSN":"1364-6613","issue":"3","journalAbbreviation":"Trends in Cognitive Sciences","language":"en","page":"127-133","source":"24.482","title":"Why self-control seems (but may not be) limited","volume":"18","author":[{"family":"Inzlicht","given":"Michael"},{"family":"Schmeichel","given":"Brandon J."},{"family":"Macrae","given":"C. Neil"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2014",3,1]]}},"label":"page","suppress-author":true}],"schema":"https://github.com/citation-style-language/schema/raw/master/csl-citation.json"}

(3)(+0000000): ITEM CSL_CITATION {"citationID":"eqABAQCk","properties":{"formattedCitation":"(\\uc0\\u37101{}\\uc0\\u27704{}\\uc0\\u29577{}\\uc0\\u65292{}\\uc0\\u36154{}\\uc0\\u37329{}\\uc0\\u27874{}, 2011, \\uc0\\u39029{} 235\\uc0\\u8211{}236; \\uc0\\u24464{}\\uc0\\u32654{}\\uc0\\u21531{}, 2015; \\uc0\\u21608{}\\uc0\\u20122{}\\uc0\\u26143{}, 2018; Jacelon, 2007)","plainCitation":"(郭永玉，贺金波, 2011, 页 235–236; 徐美君, 2015; 周亚星, 2018; Jacelon, 2007)","dontUpdate":true,"noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":9984,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/MVMTT22Y"],"itemData":{"id":9984,"type":"book","abstract":"作者简介:\n郭永玉，心理学博士，现任华中师范大学心理学院教授、博士生导师。兼任教育部高校心理学教学指导委员会委员，中国心理学会理事，中国心理学会人格心理学分会副会长，中国心理学会理论心理学与心理学史分会副会长，中国心理学会教学工作委员会委员，湖北省心理学会常务理事，《心理科学》、《心理学探新》、《心理研究》等期刊编委。曾任美国Institute of Transpersonal Psychology（ITP）访问学者，武汉大学哲学博士后，英国University of Leicester访问教授。先后在国内外学术期刊上发表论文80余篇，出版专著、译著及主编或参编学术著作或教材10余部，获得全国教育科学研究优秀成果奖、全国教育图书奖、湖北省社会科学优秀成果奖、湖北省优秀教师、湖北省教学成果奖等多项奖励。\n贺金波，心理学博士，华中师范大学心理学院讲师，硕士生导师。主要研究领域：人格心理学和认知神经科学。主要研究兴趣：人格的生理基础、网络成瘾的脑机制、人的前注意加工脑机制、心理进化的神经机制等。在SCI和SSCI收录刊物以及国内多种核心期刊发表论文10余篇，参编和参译学术著作4部。\n\n内容简介:\n《人格心理学》以人格心理学的六大理论和三大主题为学科基本架构。六大理论包括特质理论、生物学理论、精神分析、行为主义、人本主义和认知与社会认知理论，三大主题包括人格表现（demonstration）、人格动力（dynamics）和人格发展（development），合起来就是理论（theorie8）加“3D”（或“T＆3D”）架构。三大主题不仅贯穿于六大理论，而且体现在丰富的具体研究中。这种架构是一种整合人格心理学主要理论和专题研究成果的尝试，体现了这一领域从理论流派的纷争到深入的专题研究的重大转向。\n《人格心理学》写作风格简明流畅，适合本科生或以学习人格心理学基本知识为目标的读者。","ISBN":"978-7-04-031279-9","language":"zh","note":"《人格心理学》;👩‍⚖️22;🔟8.2;39.60 元;","number-of-pages":"427","publisher":"高等教育出版社","source":"Douban","title":"人格心理学","title-short":"《人格心理学》","URL":"https://book.douban.com/subject/6397699/","author":[{"family":"郭永玉，贺金波","given":""}],"accessed":{"date-parts":[["2023",3,7]]},"issued":{"date-parts":[["2011",4]]}},"locator":"235-236","label":"page"},{"id":6170,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/ZSB8ZNFF"],"itemData":{"id":6170,"type":"thesis","abstract":"Nowadays, the development process of aging in our country is accelerating, and depression, loneliness and other elderly mental issues have become increasingly prominent. Psychological attention and research is required in elderly.2-way social support of elderly includes providing support and receiving support, Previous studies have shown that social support and the sense of self-control are important variables to predict the mental health of the elderly. This study aims to explore the characteristics of the ageds’2-way social support and the sense of self-control, and the relationships between the two variables.This study used questionnaires and in-depth interview research. In the survey:First, Translating English 2-way social support scale as a tool, testing the applicability of the scale of the elderly population in China; and further revising the \"sense of self-control questionnaire of the elderly\".Subsequently, in the old center, parks, nursing homes and old university of Nanjing to sample survey, and obtained 472 valid questionnaires, then using SPSS 16.0 to analysis the data.In the process of interview, by using aim sample method,10 elderly was selected as interview subjects, and 1.5-2 hours interview were conducted with each interviewee. With their permission, the researcher recorded each conversation. Transcribed all tape-recorded sound into texts, combined with observations, the researcher collated and analyzed the data, Including the procedures of reading, explaining, landing, coding, categorizing, analyzing and writing. Combining two part study, the main conclusions are drawn as follows:（1） the overall level of the ageds’2-way social support is high;its total score, receive emotion support, receive tool support, provide emotion support and provide tool support have significant differences in age, education, income and health level. The elderly generally pursue the principle of reciprocity in their social support, but there are some differences among support with a spouse, children and friends, and it is divided into \"stay together type\", \"seek independent type\" and \"equality and mutual benefit type\", the aged’s social support mainly is emotional support, and tool support is aide. The aged’s social support from family and friends circle complemented each other.（2） The overall level of elderly’s sense of self-control is upper the middle, and it consists of five dimensions:sense of cognitive control, sense of emotional control, sense of daily life control, sense of health control and sense of interpersonal control, and the score of cognitive control is lower.elderly women is active in daily life, so their sense of daily life control is significant higher than elderly men. The elderly pay close attention on keeping healthy, active in exercise, and trying to control their own lives.（3） The 2-way social support of elderly can significant predict their sense of control level; providing emotional support and providing tool support have high power of explanatory, receiving emotional support lower, and receiving tool support haven’t enter equation. This is because providing social support reflects the elderly’s need of self-worth, and promote the sense of self-control; and receiving social support promote or hinder the sense of self-control, the key is whether it make the elderly have sense of guilty and burden.","genre":"硕士","language":"zh-CN","publisher":"南京师范大学","source":"CNKI","title":"老年人的双向社会支持与自我控制感的关系研究","URL":"https://oversea.cnki.net/kcms/detail/detail.aspx?dbcode=CMFD&dbname=CMFD201701&filename=1016304233.nh&uniplatform=NZKPT&v=S2nSL_vaqyknriWnnArtCBUUqmAFfu8GPxVAPEmVigAdUYSMk5Gy9_WrybI_VM4F","author":[{"literal":"徐美君"}],"contributor":[{"literal":"杨莉萍"}],"accessed":{"date-parts":[["2022",5,29]]},"issued":{"date-parts":[["2015"]]}}},{"id":9751,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/Z3W26GLS"],"itemData":{"id":9751,"type":"thesis","abstract":"研究背景健康老龄化已经成为社会共同关注的问题。研究认为,健康老龄化与人格因素有着密切的关系,而控制感作为个体相对稳定的人格认知因素是老年人身心健康的重要保护性因素。与健康相关的控制感侧重于反映老年人对自我健康控制的信念,它可以影响老年人自我护理的信心及能力,从而影响其身心状况和生活质量。因此正确评估老年人健康相关控制感,分析相关影响因素,对帮助、指导老年人践行健康老龄化具有重要意义。目前国内外对老年人控制感的研究多集中于对一般控制感或特定领域控制感进行评估,而对健康相关控制感的评估相对较少,且对健康相关控制感评估工具的研究多采用一般人群的普适性问卷,少见专用于老年人的健康相关控制感的评估工具。Claassens,L.博士研制的老年人健康相关控制感问卷,专用于评估老年人的健康相关控制感,且具有良好的信效度,目前国内尚未发现该问卷的汉化及应用研究的报道。研究目的引进老年人健康相关控制感问卷,形成中文版老年人健康相关控制感问卷,评价其信效度;应用该问卷进行实测,调查老年人健康控制水平及相关影响因素,为提高老年人健康相关控制感干预提供参考依据。方法1.通过翻译、回译、文化调适及预试验形成中文版老年人健康相关控制感问卷。采用方便抽样法于2017年6～9月,抽取广州市某养老院的315名老年人。采用项目分析、内部一致性、重测信度、内容效度、效标关联效度及探索性因子分析对中文版问卷进行信效度检验。2.2017年6～11月,采用便利抽样的方法,在广州市某养老院及2个社区的504老年人中应用中文版老年人健康相关控制感问卷进行实测。分析老年人健康相关控制感水平及与一般人口学资料及生活质量的关系。结果1.汉化后的中文版老年人健康相关控制感问卷共28个条目,具有良好的区分度;总问卷Cronbach's α系数为0.919,各因子Cronbach's α系数为0.746～0.897;重测信度ICC为0.933;问卷内容效度指数为0.98;效标关联效度r=0.670;探索性因子提取出5个公因子,累计解释73.884%的总方差。2.本研究老年人健康相关控制感得分为(93.70±17.69)分,与标准平均分相比,总体处于中等偏上水平。健康相关控制感得分与生活质量得分呈弱正相关;单因素分析显示,性别、养老方式、文化程度、长期居住地、婚姻状况、月收入、收入来源对老年健康相关控制感水平间差异均有统计学意义(P<0.05);多重线性回归分析显示,生活质量、文化程度、养老方式、平均月收入、性别、婚姻状况是老年人健康相关控制感的影响因素。结论汉化后的中文版老年人健康相关控制感问卷具有良好的信效度,适用于我国老年人。本研究老年人健康相关控制感得分整体得分中等偏上,但社区卫生工作者仍应关注老年人生活质量,同时,也应关注不同文化程度、养老方式、平均月收入、性别、婚姻状况的老年人,提高其健康相关控制感水平。","genre":"硕士","language":"zh","publisher":"南方医科大学","source":"CNKI","title":"中文版老年人健康相关控制感问卷的信效度检验及应用","URL":"https://oversea.cnki.net/KCMS/detail/detail.aspx?dbcode=CMFD&dbname=CMFD201901&filename=1018276493.nh&uniplatform=OVERSEA&v=IkPEYVTbjQN7OENuzni972YH9vPIqb44INTl9U1TTM7J_v0zvxDkIk7Xu1us-lbW","author":[{"literal":"周亚星"}],"accessed":{"date-parts":[["2023",3,6]]},"issued":{"date-parts":[["2018"]]}},"label":"page"},{"id":9783,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/TB65N9AT"],"itemData":{"id":9783,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"Aim. This paper is a report of a theoretically based review of literature exploring the concept of perceived control in relation to older adults. Background. Perceived control is a cognitive attribute that is a precursor to function, a mediator between social support and psychological wellbeing, and instrumental for effective disease self-management. It has been defined from several theoretical perspectives with either a global or a specific focus. Methods. A review of literature was conducted. Articles were abstracted into a table in order to compare the purpose, theoretical framework, definition of perceived control, scope of application of perceived control, research questions, subjects, methods, instruments and findings across studies. The articles were sorted by theoretical framework for analyses among and between theoretical frameworks. Results. Twenty papers published between 1995 and 2005, listed in CINAHL or Medline, with the words ‘perceived control’ in the title, and which included older adults as at least half of the sample and used one of five predominant theoretical frameworks were included in a review of the literature. In this review, perceived control is defined within the theories of social learning, self-efficacy, planned behaviour, the lifespan theory of control, and from a person–environment framework. There is little consensus among researchers as to the definition of perceived control. Conclusion. Lack of consensus on the theoretical underpinnings and variability in definition of perceived control exist. The mechanisms through which perceived control develops and is exercised are also in dispute. Nevertheless, there is general agreement that high perceived control is important for wellbeing in older adults.","call-number":"3","container-title":"Journal of Advanced Nursing","DOI":"10/c97jqk","ISSN":"1365-2648","issue":"1","language":"en","note":"_eprint: https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/pdf/10.1111/j.1365-2648.2007.04320.x","page":"1-10","source":"3.057","title":"Theoretical perspectives of perceived control in older adults: a selective review of the literature","title-short":"Theoretical perspectives of perceived control in older adults","volume":"59","author":[{"family":"Jacelon","given":"Cynthia S."}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2007"]]}}}],"schema":"https://github.com/citation-style-language/schema/raw/master/csl-citation.json"}

The exertion of self-control appears to depend on a limited resource. Just as a muscle gets tired from exertion, acts of self-control cause short-term impairments (ego depletion) in subsequent self-control, even on unrelated tasks. Research has supported the strength model in the domains of eating, drinking, spending, sexuality, intelligent thought, making choices, and interpersonal behavior. Motivational or framing factors can temporarily block the deleterious effects of being in a state of ego depletion. (3)(+0000000): ITEM CSL_CITATION {"citationID":"G7rn9VqG","properties":{"formattedCitation":"(\\uc0\\u24464{}\\uc0\\u32654{}\\uc0\\u21531{}, 2015; \\uc0\\u32705{}\\uc0\\u23047{} \\uc0\\u31561{}, 2015)","plainCitation":"(徐美君, 2015; 翁娇 等, 2015)","noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":6165,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/RIDMQMSG"],"itemData":{"id":6165,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"目的:探讨老年人控制感与成功老化间关系。方法:采用控制感量表、成功老化问卷,通过方便取样与入户访问结合的方式对250名60岁及以上的老年人进行问卷调查。结果:1男性比女性更可能实现成功老化,群居、较高的文化水平和月退休金有助于成功老化,随着年龄的增长老年人实现成功老化的可能性降低;2老年人控制感和成功老化呈显著正相关。结论:老年人控制感对成功老化有直接的影响,这一结果对老年人生命质量的提升与积极老化的实现有重要意义。","container-title":"科教文汇(上旬刊)","ISSN":"1672-7894","issue":"5","language":"zh-CN","page":"182-183","source":"CNKI","title":"老年人控制感与成功老化的关系研究","author":[{"literal":"翁娇"},{"literal":"林良章"},{"literal":"缪晓兰"},{"literal":"李菲珍"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2015"]]}}},{"id":6170,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/ZSB8ZNFF"],"itemData":{"id":6170,"type":"thesis","abstract":"Nowadays, the development process of aging in our country is accelerating, and depression, loneliness and other elderly mental issues have become increasingly prominent. Psychological attention and research is required in elderly.2-way social support of elderly includes providing support and receiving support, Previous studies have shown that social support and the sense of self-control are important variables to predict the mental health of the elderly. This study aims to explore the characteristics of the ageds’2-way social support and the sense of self-control, and the relationships between the two variables.This study used questionnaires and in-depth interview research. In the survey:First, Translating English 2-way social support scale as a tool, testing the applicability of the scale of the elderly population in China; and further revising the \"sense of self-control questionnaire of the elderly\".Subsequently, in the old center, parks, nursing homes and old university of Nanjing to sample survey, and obtained 472 valid questionnaires, then using SPSS 16.0 to analysis the data.In the process of interview, by using aim sample method,10 elderly was selected as interview subjects, and 1.5-2 hours interview were conducted with each interviewee. With their permission, the researcher recorded each conversation. Transcribed all tape-recorded sound into texts, combined with observations, the researcher collated and analyzed the data, Including the procedures of reading, explaining, landing, coding, categorizing, analyzing and writing. Combining two part study, the main conclusions are drawn as follows:（1） the overall level of the ageds’2-way social support is high;its total score, receive emotion support, receive tool support, provide emotion support and provide tool support have significant differences in age, education, income and health level. The elderly generally pursue the principle of reciprocity in their social support, but there are some differences among support with a spouse, children and friends, and it is divided into \"stay together type\", \"seek independent type\" and \"equality and mutual benefit type\", the aged’s social support mainly is emotional support, and tool support is aide. The aged’s social support from family and friends circle complemented each other.（2） The overall level of elderly’s sense of self-control is upper the middle, and it consists of five dimensions:sense of cognitive control, sense of emotional control, sense of daily life control, sense of health control and sense of interpersonal control, and the score of cognitive control is lower.elderly women is active in daily life, so their sense of daily life control is significant higher than elderly men. The elderly pay close attention on keeping healthy, active in exercise, and trying to control their own lives.（3） The 2-way social support of elderly can significant predict their sense of control level; providing emotional support and providing tool support have high power of explanatory, receiving emotional support lower, and receiving tool support haven’t enter equation. This is because providing social support reflects the elderly’s need of self-worth, and promote the sense of self-control; and receiving social support promote or hinder the sense of self-control, the key is whether it make the elderly have sense of guilty and burden.","genre":"硕士","language":"zh-CN","publisher":"南京师范大学","source":"CNKI","title":"老年人的双向社会支持与自我控制感的关系研究","URL":"https://oversea.cnki.net/kcms/detail/detail.aspx?dbcode=CMFD&dbname=CMFD201701&filename=1016304233.nh&uniplatform=NZKPT&v=S2nSL_vaqyknriWnnArtCBUUqmAFfu8GPxVAPEmVigAdUYSMk5Gy9_WrybI_VM4F","author":[{"literal":"徐美君"}],"contributor":[{"literal":"杨莉萍"}],"accessed":{"date-parts":[["2022",5,29]]},"issued":{"date-parts":[["2015"]]}}}],"schema":"https://github.com/citation-style-language/schema/raw/master/csl-citation.json"}

(3)(+0000000): ITEM CSL_CITATION {"citationID":"pQ9KSiwP","properties":{"formattedCitation":"(1978)","plainCitation":"(1978)","noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":9990,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/86QUCY9A"],"itemData":{"id":9990,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"Coping refers to behavior that protects people from being psychologically harmed by problematic social experience, a behavior that importantly mediates the impact that societies have on their members. The protective function of coping behavior can be exercised in 3 ways: by eliminating or modifying conditions giving rise to problems; by perceptually controlling the meaning of experience in a manner that neutralizes its problematic character; and by keeping the emotional consequences of problems within manageable bounds. The efficacy of a number of concrete coping behaviors representing these 3 functions was evaluated. Results indicate that individuals' coping interventions are most effective when dealing with problems within the close interpersonal role areas of marriage and child-rearing and least effective when dealing with the more impersonal problems found in occupation. The effective coping modes are unequally distributed in society, with men, the educated, and the affluent making greater use of the efficacious mechanisms.","container-title":"Journal of health and social behavior","DOI":"10/fvkk4g","journalAbbreviation":"Journal of health and social behavior","language":"en","page":"2-21","source":"ResearchGate","title":"The Structure of Coping","volume":"19","author":[{"family":"Pearlin","given":"Leonard"},{"family":"Schooler","given":"Carmi"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["1978",4,1]]}},"label":"page","suppress-author":true}],"schema":"https://github.com/citation-style-language/schema/raw/master/csl-citation.json"}

(3)(+0000000): ITEM CSL_CITATION {"citationID":"hneSqm8K","properties":{"formattedCitation":"(Drewelies et al., 2017; Wiest et al., 2013)","plainCitation":"(Drewelies et al., 2017; Wiest et al., 2013)","noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":6204,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/ZAG4SIPS"],"itemData":{"id":6204,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"Perceived control is a key component of successful aging and may serve as a protective factor against age-related declines in central domains of functioning. However, it is a largely open question whether and how perceived control changes from midadulthood to very old age and how such change is shaped by health and social contexts. To examine these questions, we apply growth models to up to 15-year 4-wave longitudinal data from the German Ageing Survey (DEAS; N = 10,081; aged 40-85 years at baseline; 49% women). Results revealed that perceived control is relatively stable in midlife, but starts to decline after midlife. Starting at 70, perceived control declines an average of a quarter of a SD per 10 years. Suffering from comorbidity and functional limitations were each associated with considerably lower perceived control. Volunteering and less loneliness were each uniquely associated with higher perceived control, over and above the other social factors as well as sociodemographic and health variables. Surprisingly, less social support was associated with stronger perceived control. We also found significant interaction effects suggesting that the combination of functional limitations with older age and loneliness with lower education were each associated with particularly compromised perceived control. Overall we found little evidence for correlates of change in perceived control, with only the loneliness-control association becoming slightly weaker over time. We take our findings to suggest that various different facets of social integration later in life are uniquely relevant for perceived control and suggest routes for further inquiry. (PsycINFO Database Record","archive_location":"33 citation(s)","container-title":"Psychology and Aging","DOI":"10.1037/pag0000143","ISSN":"1939-1498","issue":"1","journalAbbreviation":"Psychol Aging","language":"eng","note":"PMID: 28182499","page":"76-92","source":"PubMed","title":"Perceived control across the second half of life: The role of physical health and social integration","title-short":"🔤后半生的感知控制：身体健康和社会融合的作用","volume":"32","author":[{"family":"Drewelies","given":"Johanna"},{"family":"Wagner","given":"Jenny"},{"family":"Tesch-Römer","given":"Clemens"},{"family":"Heckhausen","given":"Jutta"},{"family":"Gerstorf","given":"Denis"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2017",2]]}}},{"id":10003,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/RQY6GF5W"],"itemData":{"id":10003,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"Life satisfaction and control beliefs are established indicators of successful aging and predict mortality. However, it has not yet been examined whether they independently predict mortality or interact. We examined main and interaction effects using Cox proportional hazards models in a sample of older adults ( N = 1402; age range: 65–91). Only the interaction of life satisfaction and control beliefs significantly predicted mortality when controlling for socio-demographic variables and health. These findings suggest that detrimental effects of low control beliefs can be buffered by life satisfaction, and unexpectedly, that high levels of both factors are not most protective against mortality.","container-title":"Journal of Health Psychology","DOI":"10/grwc72","ISSN":"1359-1053, 1461-7277","issue":"9","journalAbbreviation":"J Health Psychol","language":"en","page":"1199-1208","source":"DOI.org (Crossref)","title":"Life satisfaction and feeling in control: Indicators of successful aging predict mortality in old age","title-short":"Life satisfaction and feeling in control","volume":"18","author":[{"family":"Wiest","given":"Maja"},{"family":"Schüz","given":"Benjamin"},{"family":"Wurm","given":"Susanne"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2013",9]]}}}],"schema":"https://github.com/citation-style-language/schema/raw/master/csl-citation.json"}

We incorporated a new measure of individual differences in self-control into two large investigations of a broad spectrum of behaviors. The new scale showed good internal consistency and retest reliability. Higher scores on self-control correlated with a higher grade point average, better adjustment (fewer reports of psychopathology, higher self-esteem), less binge eating and alcohol abuse, better relationships and interpersonal skills, secure attachment, and more optimal emotional responses. Tests for curvilinearity failed to indicate any drawbacks of so-called overcontrol, and the positive effects remained after controlling for social desirability. Low self-control is thus a significant risk factor for a broad range of personal and interpersonal problems.","container-title":"Journal of Personality","DOI":"10/ff93z5","ISSN":"0022-3506","issue":"2","journalAbbreviation":"J Pers","language":"en","note":"PMID: 15016066","page":"271-324","source":"PubMed","title":"High self-control predicts good adjustment, less pathology, better grades, and interpersonal success","volume":"72","author":[{"family":"Tangney","given":"June P."},{"family":"Baumeister","given":"Roy F."},{"family":"Boone","given":"Angie Luzio"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2004",4]]}},"label":"page","suppress-author":true}],"schema":"https://github.com/citation-style-language/schema/raw/master/csl-citation.json"}

(3)(+0000000): ITEM CSL_CITATION {"citationID":"ebqt30vf","properties":{"formattedCitation":"(G\\uc0\\u252{}rdere et al., 2022; Nilsen et al., 2020; Pilarska & Baumeister, 2018; Unger et al., 2016)","plainCitation":"(Gürdere et al., 2022; Nilsen et al., 2020; Pilarska & Baumeister, 2018; Unger et al., 2016)","noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":10025,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/KX52KR86"],"itemData":{"id":10025,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"The Brief Self-Control Scale (BSCS) developed by Tangney, Baumeister, and Boone (2004) is a widely used measure of trait self-control. The present study aimed to validate Italian version of the BSCS. 262 Italian university students completed BSCS along with measures of grit, impulsive behavior, self-esteem, resilience, and psychological distress. 143 of the first sample completed BSCS after three weeks again. Results indicated that the Italian version of the BSCS is one-dimensional as the original BSCS. Good internal consistency and test-retest stability were documented. Convergent and divergent validity of the construct was established with the association between BSCS and measures of grit and impulsive behavior. Furthermore, predictive validity assessment showed that BSCS positively predicted self-esteem and resilience, and negatively predicted psychological distress as expected. In conclusion, findings suggest that the Italian BSCS is a reliable and valid instrument assessing trait self-control in Italian speaking populations.","container-title":"Journal of Evidence-Based Psychotherapies","DOI":"10/grwddc","ISSN":"23600853, 23600853","issue":"2","journalAbbreviation":"JEBP","language":"en","page":"103-114","source":"DOI.org (Crossref)","title":"The Italian Validation of the Brief Self-Control Scale: A Preliminary Analysis","title-short":"The Italian Validation of the Brief Self-Control Scale","volume":"22","author":[{"family":"Gürdere","given":"Ceren"},{"family":"Bottesi","given":"Gioia"},{"family":"Pfeffer","given":"Ines"},{"family":"Carraro","given":"Eleonora"},{"family":"Ghisi","given":"Marta"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2022",9,1]]}},"label":"page"},{"id":10026,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/UMK2FQH7"],"itemData":{"id":10026,"type":"article-journal","container-title":"Psychological Assessment","DOI":"10/ghdqnn","ISSN":"1939-134X, 1040-3590","issue":"11","journalAbbreviation":"Psychological Assessment","language":"en","page":"1057-1074","source":"DOI.org (Crossref)","title":"The Multidimensional Self-Control Scale (MSCS): Development and validation.","title-short":"The Multidimensional Self-Control Scale (MSCS)","volume":"32","author":[{"family":"Nilsen","given":"Fredrik A."},{"family":"Bang","given":"Henning"},{"family":"Boe","given":"Ole"},{"family":"Martinsen","given":"Øyvind Lund"},{"family":"Lang-Ree","given":"Ole Christian"},{"family":"Røysamb","given":"Espen"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2020",11]]}}},{"id":10013,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/TJNPP2XK"],"itemData":{"id":10013,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"Theory and research have both characterized self-control as a vital human strength. Tangney, Baumeister, and Boone’s (2004) Self-Control Scale (SCS) is a 36-item self-report questionnaire that assess individual differences in multiple aspects of self-control. The scale is now considered the preeminent measure of self-control in social and psychological research. This article presents studies that evaluated: (a) the psychometric properties of the Polish version of the SCS, and (b) whether higher SCS scores correlated with positive outcomes in Poland. A total of 441 Polish university students took part in the studies. Psychometrically, the Polish SCS proved to be reasonably sound, with good internal consistency (α = .89). Correlations with criteria measures showed that both full and brief self-control scores were positively related to self-esteem, perspective taking, and guilt-proneness, while negatively related to personal distress, proneness to shame, externalization, and unconcern. High self-control was also associated with being conscientious, emotionally stable, and open. It is concluded that the Polish SCS offers a viable option for assessing trait self-control and for studying its relationship with a broad spectrum of psychological and social variables.","container-title":"Polish Psychological Bulletin","DOI":"10/grwdc3","journalAbbreviation":"Polish Psychological Bulletin","language":"en","page":"95–106","source":"ResearchGate","title":"Psychometric properties and correlates of the Polish version of the Self-Control Scale (SCS)","volume":"49","author":[{"family":"Pilarska","given":"Aleksandra"},{"family":"Baumeister","given":"Roy"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2018",4,1]]}}},{"id":10019,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/F3PKXKY9"],"itemData":{"id":10019,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"Recent studies have characterized self-control as a vital psychological variable that helps explain various problems. Tangney's Self-Control Scale (SCS) is a self-report measurement to assess individual differences in traits of self-control. It has gained popularity in social and psychological science research. In China, there are a few Chinese-version scales measuring general self-control, which can be applied to college students. The purposes of the present study were to evaluate: (a) the psychometric properties of the Chinese version of Tangney's SCS using confirmatory factor analysis, and (b) whether higher scores on the scale correlated with positive outcomes in China. The final sample in this study consisted of 371 Chinese college students aged 17-23 years. The Full SCS and Brief SCS were both found to have a reasonable fitness, which also had satisfactory internal consistencies and a high correlation. Higher scores on the SCS correlated with higher self-esteem, extraversion, better harmony in interpersonal relationships and an appropriate anger expression, less impulsiveness, and state and trait anger. The test-retest reliability was confirmed in two additional samples. Tangney's SCS could be used in China.","container-title":"PsyCh journal","DOI":"10/ggsf2p","journalAbbreviation":"PsyCh journal","language":"en","source":"ResearchGate","title":"The revising of the Tangney Self-Control Scale for Chinese students","volume":"5","author":[{"family":"Unger","given":"Alexander"},{"family":"Bi","given":"Chongzeng"},{"family":"Xiao","given":"Ying-Ying"},{"family":"Ybarra","given":"Oscar"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2016",5,4]]}}}],"schema":"https://github.com/citation-style-language/schema/raw/master/csl-citation.json"}

(3)(+0000000): ITEM CSL_CITATION {"citationID":"iGXxB3nr","properties":{"formattedCitation":"(2010)","plainCitation":"(2010)","noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":6133,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/JC4GKRGX"],"itemData":{"id":6133,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"目的修订Shapiro控制问卷（Shapiro Control Inventory,SCI）的一般领域控制感与控制方式2个分量表,并评估其信效度。方法对SCI进行翻译和初次试测后,343名大学生完成了中文版Shapiro控制问卷测试版的评定,利用主成分法对一般领域控制感与控制方式量表进行因素分析,并评估其内部一致性信度、重测信度。结果修订后的一般领域控制感量表抽取2个因子共15个条目、控制方式量表抽取4个因子共44个条目,各量表因素结构与原量表较为一致,2个量表下各子量表的内部一致信度在0.55～0.88之间,重测信度在0.70～0.88之间。结论修订后的控制感与控制方式量表内部结构较为明晰,具有较好的内部一致信度和重测信度,符合心理测量学的标准。","container-title":"中国健康心理学杂志","DOI":"10.13342/j.cnki.cjhp.2010.03.036","ISSN":"1005-1252","issue":"3","language":"zh-CN","page":"361-363","source":"CNKI","title":"一般领域控制感与控制方式量表的修订","volume":"18","author":[{"literal":"申自力"},{"literal":"蔡太生"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2010"]]}},"label":"page","suppress-author":true}],"schema":"https://github.com/citation-style-language/schema/raw/master/csl-citation.json"}

(3)(+0000000): ITEM CSL_CITATION {"citationID":"kduANWRE","properties":{"formattedCitation":"(2016)","plainCitation":"(2016)","noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":10019,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/F3PKXKY9"],"itemData":{"id":10019,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"Recent studies have characterized self-control as a vital psychological variable that helps explain various problems. Tangney's Self-Control Scale (SCS) is a self-report measurement to assess individual differences in traits of self-control. It has gained popularity in social and psychological science research. In China, there are a few Chinese-version scales measuring general self-control, which can be applied to college students. The purposes of the present study were to evaluate: (a) the psychometric properties of the Chinese version of Tangney's SCS using confirmatory factor analysis, and (b) whether higher scores on the scale correlated with positive outcomes in China. The final sample in this study consisted of 371 Chinese college students aged 17-23 years. The Full SCS and Brief SCS were both found to have a reasonable fitness, which also had satisfactory internal consistencies and a high correlation. Higher scores on the SCS correlated with higher self-esteem, extraversion, better harmony in interpersonal relationships and an appropriate anger expression, less impulsiveness, and state and trait anger. The test-retest reliability was confirmed in two additional samples. Tangney's SCS could be used in China.","container-title":"PsyCh journal","DOI":"10/ggsf2p","journalAbbreviation":"PsyCh journal","language":"en","source":"ResearchGate","title":"The revising of the Tangney Self-Control Scale for Chinese students","volume":"5","author":[{"family":"Unger","given":"Alexander"},{"family":"Bi","given":"Chongzeng"},{"family":"Xiao","given":"Ying-Ying"},{"family":"Ybarra","given":"Oscar"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2016",5,4]]}},"label":"page","suppress-author":true}],"schema":"https://github.com/citation-style-language/schema/raw/master/csl-citation.json"}

(3)(+0000000): ITEM CSL_CITATION {"citationID":"gy0DKqod","properties":{"formattedCitation":"(2012)","plainCitation":"(2012)","noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":6129,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/GG33H8V5"],"itemData":{"id":6129,"type":"thesis","abstract":"Nowadays,the gap between the rich and poor has become a hot-button issue in Chinese society.In recent years,the widening rich-poor gap has brought about widespread perception of distributive injustice and such social mentality as resentment of the rich and officials.According to the attribution theory of perception of distributive injustice and its relevant studies,individuals’ attribution tendency in the gap between the rich and poor can strongly predict their perception of distributive injustice.Therefore,understanding the attribution tendency in the rich-poor gap for for different social classes has important practical implications for administers to monitor and alleviate public perception of injustice effectively,cultivate rational and calm national mentality,and maintain social stability.However,seen from the current research situation,although attribution has been always an important research subject in the field of social cognition,there has been only a few studies on social class and attribution tendency and even less studies on social class and attribution tendency in the rich-poor gap.This dissertation,based on the theoretical background of culture and attribution and focusing on social class--an important subculture variable and the social reality situation of the rich-poor gap,aimed to explore the attribution tendency in the rich-poor gap for different social classes systematically through the following 6 concrete studies.Study 1 developed the rich-poor gap attribution questionnaire and investigated the relationship between social class（including objective social class and subjective social class）and attribution tendency in the rich-poor gap with a sample of 1,781 urban and rural residents.The results showed that lower subjective social class individuals in our samples were more likely to attribute the gap between the rich and poor to such external contextual factors as inequitable distribution of resources,guan-xi or personal connections,and family background.But objective social class was not stably and consistently associated with individual’s attribution tendency in the rich-poor gap.To further reveal the causal relationship between subjective social class and attribution tendency in the rich-poor gap,study 2,with 73 middle class adults as participants,experimentally manipulated individuals’ subjective social class,to examine the effect of individuals’ temporary experience of relative social class on their attribution tendency in the rich-poor gap.The results also indicated that lower subjective social class individuals tended to make more external attribution in the rich-poor gap.Further,study 3,study 4 and study 5 explored the psychological mechanism of the influence of subjective social class on attribution tendency in the rich-poor gap mainly from the angle of cognition and motivation.Study 3 examined the effect of analytic-holistic cognitive style,using the methods of eye movement and behavioral experiment and 60 typical high and low class individuals as its participants;study 4 examined the effect of self-serving motive,using the method of scene experiment and 147 middle class adults as its participants;study 5 investigated 831 urban and rural residents to revise the scale of sense of control and test the mediation effect of perceived control.The results of the above-mentioned 3 studies showed that,the reason why lower subjective social class individuals were more likely to attribute the rich-poor gap to external contextual factors was neither mainly due to the analytic-holistic cognitive style nor the self-serving motive;it was the sense of control that partially mediated the relationship between subjective social class and attribution tendency in the rich-poor gap.Specifically,lower subjective social class individuals tended to feel lower personal control;as a result of this lower sense of personal control,they were more likely to explain the gap between the rich and poor in terms of external causes rather than internal causes.The effects of the analytic-holistic cognitive style and the self-serving motive were not verified well in our studies,which needed to be further tested in future research.Finally,grounded on the mediation effect of perceived control on the relationship between subjective social class and attribution tendency in the rich-poor gap,study 6 adopted the method of situational simulated experiment with a sample of 93 undergraduates as participants,to further examine the moderation effect of social constraints on external attribution tendency in the rich-poor gap for lower social class individuals,which was expected to provide a reference for public management countermeasures of promoting lower social class individuals to reduce external attribution tendency in the rich-poor gap.The results showed that the moderation effect of social constraints was significant.Specifically,in the situation with less social constraints,there was a marked reduction of the tendency for lower class individuals to make more external explanations for the gap between the rich and poor,which indicated that reducing social constraints could help lower class individuals to downplay external causes of the gap between the rich and poor.To sum up,the above-mentioned 6 studies focused on the relationship between social class and attribution tendency in the rich-poor gap and solved the 3 big questions of “what”,“why” and “how”.","genre":"博士","language":"zh-CN","note":"DOI: 10.27159/d.cnki.ghzsu.2012.000005","publisher":"华中师范大学","source":"CNKI","title":"不同社会阶层对贫富差距的归因倾向研究","URL":"https://oversea.cnki.net/kcms/detail/detail.aspx?dbcode=CDFD&dbname=CDFDLAST2022&filename=1021914162.nh&uniplatform=NZKPT&v=FcHBPt74A1dWb_UVWve4OYCpgXuyLekVSx_p6UmfnoJq_IvF1eyQSoTOAJ9tfz9U","author":[{"literal":"李静"}],"contributor":[{"literal":"郭永玉"}],"accessed":{"date-parts":[["2022",5,29]]},"issued":{"date-parts":[["2012"]]}},"label":"page","suppress-author":true}],"schema":"https://github.com/citation-style-language/schema/raw/master/csl-citation.json"}

(3)(+0000000): ITEM CSL_CITATION {"citationID":"KzXuIQDh","properties":{"formattedCitation":"(1998)","plainCitation":"(1998)","noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":10027,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/KZ3XIWQ6"],"itemData":{"id":10027,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"The authors examined social class differences in 2 aspects of the sense of control (mastery and perceived constraints) in 3 national probability samples of men and women ages 25-75 years (N1 = 1,014; N2 = 1,195; N3 = 3,485). Participants with lower income had lower perceived mastery and higher perceived constraints, as well as poorer health. Results of hierarchical multiple regression analyses showed that for all income groups, higher perceived mastery and lower perceived constraints were related to better health, greater life satisfaction, and lower depressive symptoms. However, control beliefs played a moderating role; participants in the lowest income group with a high sense of control showed levels of health and well-being comparable with the higher income groups. The results provided some evidence that psychosocial variables such as sense of control may be useful in understanding social class differences in health.","container-title":"Journal of Personality and Social Psychology","DOI":"10/b53pht","ISSN":"0022-3514","issue":"3","journalAbbreviation":"J Pers Soc Psychol","language":"en","note":"PMID: 9523418","page":"763-773","source":"PubMed","title":"The sense of control as a moderator of social class differences in health and well-being","volume":"74","author":[{"family":"Lachman","given":"M. (3)(+0000000): ITEM CSL_CITATION {"citationID":"lpbXbMPX","properties":{"formattedCitation":"(\\uc0\\u38472{}\\uc0\\u33459{} \\uc0\\u31561{}, 2021; \\uc0\\u39532{}\\uc0\\u29141{}, 2022)","plainCitation":"(陈芳 等, 2021; 马燕, 2022)","noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":10030,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/6YFAR346"],"itemData":{"id":10030,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"目的:探讨大学生亲社会行为、控制感和消费决策风格之间的关系及其内在作用机制。方法:采用亲社会倾向量表、控制感量表以及消费决策风格量表,对514名大学生进行问卷调查,利用Bootstrap检验控制感在亲社会行为和消费决策风格之间的中介效应。结果:(1)独生子女大学生的亲社会行为以及控制感高于非独生子女大学生(t=1.99,2.07;P<0.05),每月生活费用在1500元以上的大学生消费决策风格比其他水平生活费用的大学生更加突出(F=5.01,P<0.01);(2)亲社会行为与消费决策风格呈显著正相关(r=0.47,P<0.01),消费决策风格与个人限制感呈显著负相关(r=-0.27,P<0.01)、与个人掌控感呈显著正相关(r=0.43,P<0.01),亲社会行为与控制感呈显著正相关(r=0.13,P<0.01);(3)亲社会行为能够正向预测消费决策风格(t=12.21,P<0.01),控制感能够负向预测消费决策风格(t=-2.64,P<0.01);(4)控制感在亲社会行为与消费决策风格之间起部分遮掩作用(间接效应值=-0.02,P<0.001,95%CI置信区间:[-0.05,-0.001])。结论:大学生的亲社会行为能够正向预测消费决策风格,控制感在其中起中介作用。","container-title":"中国健康心理学杂志","DOI":"10/gm55tp","ISSN":"2096-4811","issue":"10","language":"zh","page":"1566-1570","source":"CNKI","title":"控制感在大学生亲社会行为与消费决策风格间的中介作用","volume":"29","author":[{"literal":"陈芳"},{"literal":"杨妹香"},{"literal":"郑秋悦"},{"literal":"魏璊"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2021"]]}}},{"id":10031,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/94Z2UDLJ"],"itemData":{"id":10031,"type":"thesis","abstract":"在我国人口老龄化的背景之下,老年人的福祉需要得到更多关注。基于此,本研究旨在调查老年人控制感、生命意义感与主观幸福感的现状并探讨三者的相关关系,表明生命意义感在控制感和主观幸福感之间存在中介作用。研究选取居住在内蒙古自治区某市4个社区的520位老年人为被试,采用《控制感量表》、《老年人生命意义源量表》、《纽芬兰纪念大学幸福度量表》进行测试。使用SPSS26.0统计软件对老年人控制感、生命意义感、主观幸福感在人口学变量上的差异和三者之间的关系进行分析;使用PROCESS插件进行中介效应分析。研究表明:(1)老年人控制感处于中等偏上水平,并在人口学变量上存在显著差异。其中健康状况良好的老年人控制感更高;60-69岁老年人控制感高于70-90岁老年人;户籍所在地为城市的老年人控制感更高;有配偶的老年人控制感高于无配偶的老年人;拥有1个子女的老年人的控制感高于拥有3个或3个以上子女的老年人;与老伴和子女同住的老年人控制感最高;文化水平在高中以上的老年人控制感相对更高;个人平均月收入越高的老年人控制感越高。(2)老年人生命意义感处于中等偏上水平,并在人口学变量上存在显著差异。其中健康状况良好的老年人生命意义感更高;60-69岁老年人生命意义感高于80-90岁老年人;有配偶的老年人生命意义感更高;与老伴和子女同住或与老伴同住的老年人生命意义感更高;文化水平高的老年人生命意义感更高;退休前在国家机关、事业单位工作的老年人生命意义感高于退休前是工人或农民的老年人;个人平均月收入越高的老年人生命意义感越高。(3)老年人主观幸福感处于中等水平,并在人口学变量上存在显著差异。其中健康状况良好的老年人主观幸福感更高;60-69岁老年人主观幸福感高于70-90岁老年人;户籍所在地为城市的老年人主观幸福感更高;有配偶的老年人主观幸福感高于无配偶的老年人;拥有1个子女的老年人的主观幸福感大于拥有3个或3个以上子女的老年人;与老伴和子女同住的老年人主观幸福感最高;文化水平在高中以上的老年人主观幸福感更高;个人平均月收入越高的老年人主观幸福感越高。(4)控制感、生命意义感对老年人主观幸福感有显著预测作用,控制感可以通过生命意义感对老年人主观幸福感产生影响。","genre":"硕士","language":"zh","note":"DOI: 10.27230/d.cnki.gnmsu.2022.000216","publisher":"内蒙古师范大学","source":"CNKI","title":"老年人控制感和生命意义感与主观幸福感的现状及关系研究","URL":"https://chn.oversea.cnki.net/KCMS/detail/detail.aspx?dbcode=CMFD&dbname=CMFD202202&filename=1022541612.nh&uniplatform=OVERSEA&v=G2pwCp0akuq9uct_kcV1EeaUxbFqKO4TwU14hu-TMh0-xJv1vEMjaPxgVgjbIco6","author":[{"literal":"马燕"}],"accessed":{"date-parts":[["2023",3,8]]},"issued":{"date-parts":[["2022"]]}}}],"schema":"https://github.com/citation-style-language/schema/raw/master/csl-citation.json"}

(3)(+0000000): ITEM CSL_CITATION {"citationID":"XepXD1B7","properties":{"formattedCitation":"(2005)","plainCitation":"(2005)","noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":10035,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/XUPSGZIL"],"itemData":{"id":10035,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"目的探讨老年人日常环境控制感的特点及其与主观幸福感的关系。方法将自编的老年人日常环境控制感问卷、主观幸福感问卷、一般自我效能感问卷对217位60岁以上老年人进行施测。结果探索性因素分析表明老年人生活环境控制感包括三个维度。总问卷的内部一致性系数为0.853,子维度的内部一致性系数为0.6~0.8,维度间相关为0.3~0.4,各维度与总分的相关在0.8左右。老年女性的日常生活环境控制感性别差异显著而年龄效应不显著。相关及回归分析表明,物理环境控制感与主观幸福感中的正性情绪存在密切关系。结论自编的老年生活环境控制感有较好的信效度;老年女性的日常环境控制感高于老年男性;老年人物理环境控制感可以明显预测主观幸福感中的正性情绪。","container-title":"中国老年学杂志","ISSN":"1005-9202","issue":"10","language":"zh","page":"1145-1147","source":"CNKI","title":"老年人的日常环境控制感特点及其与主观幸福感的关系","author":[{"literal":"王大华"},{"literal":"申继亮"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2005"]]}},"label":"page","suppress-author":true}],"schema":"https://github.com/citation-style-language/schema/raw/master/csl-citation.json"}

(3)(+0000000): ITEM CSL_CITATION {"citationID":"vzpyrFCj","properties":{"formattedCitation":"(\\uc0\\u21608{}\\uc0\\u20122{}\\uc0\\u26143{}, 2018)","plainCitation":"(周亚星, 2018)","noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":9751,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/Z3W26GLS"],"itemData":{"id":9751,"type":"thesis","abstract":"研究背景健康老龄化已经成为社会共同关注的问题。研究认为,健康老龄化与人格因素有着密切的关系,而控制感作为个体相对稳定的人格认知因素是老年人身心健康的重要保护性因素。与健康相关的控制感侧重于反映老年人对自我健康控制的信念,它可以影响老年人自我护理的信心及能力,从而影响其身心状况和生活质量。因此正确评估老年人健康相关控制感,分析相关影响因素,对帮助、指导老年人践行健康老龄化具有重要意义。目前国内外对老年人控制感的研究多集中于对一般控制感或特定领域控制感进行评估,而对健康相关控制感的评估相对较少,且对健康相关控制感评估工具的研究多采用一般人群的普适性问卷,少见专用于老年人的健康相关控制感的评估工具。Claassens,L.博士研制的老年人健康相关控制感问卷,专用于评估老年人的健康相关控制感,且具有良好的信效度,目前国内尚未发现该问卷的汉化及应用研究的报道。研究目的引进老年人健康相关控制感问卷,形成中文版老年人健康相关控制感问卷,评价其信效度;应用该问卷进行实测,调查老年人健康控制水平及相关影响因素,为提高老年人健康相关控制感干预提供参考依据。方法1.通过翻译、回译、文化调适及预试验形成中文版老年人健康相关控制感问卷。采用方便抽样法于2017年6～9月,抽取广州市某养老院的315名老年人。采用项目分析、内部一致性、重测信度、内容效度、效标关联效度及探索性因子分析对中文版问卷进行信效度检验。2.2017年6～11月,采用便利抽样的方法,在广州市某养老院及2个社区的504老年人中应用中文版老年人健康相关控制感问卷进行实测。分析老年人健康相关控制感水平及与一般人口学资料及生活质量的关系。结果1.汉化后的中文版老年人健康相关控制感问卷共28个条目,具有良好的区分度;总问卷Cronbach's α系数为0.919,各因子Cronbach's α系数为0.746～0.897;重测信度ICC为0.933;问卷内容效度指数为0.98;效标关联效度r=0.670;探索性因子提取出5个公因子,累计解释73.884%的总方差。2.本研究老年人健康相关控制感得分为(93.70±17.69)分,与标准平均分相比,总体处于中等偏上水平。健康相关控制感得分与生活质量得分呈弱正相关;单因素分析显示,性别、养老方式、文化程度、长期居住地、婚姻状况、月收入、收入来源对老年健康相关控制感水平间差异均有统计学意义(P<0.05);多重线性回归分析显示,生活质量、文化程度、养老方式、平均月收入、性别、婚姻状况是老年人健康相关控制感的影响因素。结论汉化后的中文版老年人健康相关控制感问卷具有良好的信效度,适用于我国老年人。本研究老年人健康相关控制感得分整体得分中等偏上,但社区卫生工作者仍应关注老年人生活质量,同时,也应关注不同文化程度、养老方式、平均月收入、性别、婚姻状况的老年人,提高其健康相关控制感水平。","genre":"硕士","language":"zh","publisher":"南方医科大学","source":"CNKI","title":"中文版老年人健康相关控制感问卷的信效度检验及应用","URL":"https://oversea.cnki.net/KCMS/detail/detail.aspx?dbcode=CMFD&dbname=CMFD201901&filename=1018276493.nh&uniplatform=OVERSEA&v=IkPEYVTbjQN7OENuzni972YH9vPIqb44INTl9U1TTM7J_v0zvxDkIk7Xu1us-lbW","author":[{"literal":"周亚星"}],"accessed":{"date-parts":[["2023",3,6]]},"issued":{"date-parts":[["2018"]]}}}],"schema":"https://github.com/citation-style-language/schema/raw/master/csl-citation.json"}

(3)(+0000000): ITEM CSL_CITATION {"citationID":"W0c4TDxQ","properties":{"formattedCitation":"(2020)","plainCitation":"(2020)","noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":6155,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/ZWSP9UPH"],"itemData":{"id":6155,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"目的调查社区老年人健康相关控制感现状,分析其影响因素。方法采用一般资料问卷、中文版老年人健康相关控制感问卷、Herth希望量表及家庭关怀度指数问卷对湖南省长沙市4个社区共281名社区老年人进行调查。采用多元线性回归分析健康相关控制感的影响因素。结果社区老年人健康相关控制感、希望水平、家庭关怀度总分分别为（86.79±11.66）分、（33.94±3.50）分、（7.71±2.98）分。多元线性回归分析结果显示,婚姻状况、收入满足开支情况、希望水平、家庭关怀度进入回归方程是社区老年人健康相关控制感的影响因素（P<0.05）,共解释总变异的48.7%。结论本组社区老年人健康相关控制感处于中等水平,受不同婚姻状况、收入满足开支情况、希望水平、家庭关怀度的影响。建议针对不同婚姻状况、不同经济能力的老年人提供个性化健康指导,宣传医疗服务优待政策,倡导积极科学的健康观念;定期上门寻访以动态监测健康,加强对老年人及家属的健康教育,鼓励老年人采取由自己主动控制健康的积极态度,以提高健康相关控制感水平,促进其健康老化。","container-title":"护理学报","DOI":"10.16460/j.issn1008-9969.2020.22.057","ISSN":"1008-9969","issue":"22","language":"zh-CN","page":"57-61","source":"CNKI","title":"281名社区老年人健康相关控制感现状及影响因素研究","volume":"27","author":[{"literal":"何俊"},{"literal":"刘前前"},{"literal":"杨雨涵"},{"literal":"李星妍"},{"literal":"周杨辉"},{"literal":"王冬华"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2020"]]}},"label":"page","suppress-author":true}],"schema":"https://github.com/citation-style-language/schema/raw/master/csl-citation.json"}
