(3)(+0000000): ITEM CSL_CITATION {"citationID":"me0F3tlk","properties":{"formattedCitation":"(\\uc0\\u20522{}\\uc0\\u24314{}\\uc0\\u26149{}, \\uc0\\u26041{}\\uc0\\u33021{}, 2021; \\uc0\\u31561{}, 2014)","plainCitation":"(倪建春, 方能, 2021; 孙滕滕 等, 2021; 张正强, 杨晴, 2018; 陈世平 等, 2014)","noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":2824,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/GTIHTMRM"],"itemData":{"id":2824,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"为了更好地促进退休人员人力资源的开发和提高退休人员的生活质量,本研究采用城市退休人员再就业自我效能量表等工具对城市退休人员的再就业意向进行调查。探索了影响退休人员再就业意向的相关因素以及它们之间相互的关系。结果发现:男性退休人员比女性退休人员再就业意向更强;年龄越低再就业意向越强;专业技术比受教育程度对退休人员的再就业意向有更大影响;就业机会、再就业态度、再就业自我效能和他人支持都能显著地预测再就业意向。研究表明,再就业自我效能通过再就业态度影响再就业意向,工具性态度通过情感性态度影响再就业意向,外部因素(就业机会、他人支持)能通过内部因素(求职自我效能)对再就业意向产生影响。","call-number":"再就业问卷、家庭负担问卷","container-title":"心理与行为研究","ISSN":"1672-0628","issue":"05","language":"zh-CN","note":"9 citations(CNKI)[2022-4-13]<CSSCI>","page":"688-694","source":"CNKI","title":"影响城市退休人员再就业意向的相关因素研究","volume":"12","author":[{"literal":"陈世平"},{"literal":"韦诗"},{"literal":"王晓庄"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2014"]]}}},{"id":5866,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/56RHJEEB"],"itemData":{"id":5866,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"<正>在老龄化率不断上升、预期寿命不断延长的背景下,退休人员作为经验丰富的劳动群体,将越来越能发挥出与年轻劳动者互补的作用,是全社会人力资源不可缺少的组成部分,研究其再就业规律具有重要前瞻性意义。为了解退休人员再就业状况,国家统计局浙江调查总队于近期对734名退休人员开展了调查,发现退休人员再就业具有明显的群体集中、行业集中、工作内容连续等特征,其再就业行为起到了提高老年人收入、丰富老年生活、缓解局部缺工问题的积极作用。","container-title":"中国统计","ISSN":"1002-4557","issue":"7","language":"zh-CN","page":"12-14","source":"CNKI","title":"退休人员再就业状况调查及政策建议","author":[{"literal":"倪建春"},{"literal":"方能"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2021"]]}}},{"id":7892,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/4RSA4B9N"],"itemData":{"id":7892,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"目的了解延吉市某社区老年人社会参与现状并分析其影响因素。方法采用自编一般人口学资料调查问卷、社会参与调查问卷、简易精神状态评价量表（MMSE）对253名社区老年人进行调查。结果社会参与得分为（9.35±2.06）分,在性别、年龄、养老保险、医疗保险、对社区卫生保健服务满意度、对社区公共服务满意度方面存在差异,其差异具有统计学意义（P<0.05）。结论延吉市某社区老年人社会参与处于中等水平,其中女性、60岁以上、有养老保险和医疗保险、对社区卫生保健服务满意、对社区公共服务满意的老年人社会参与水平更高,因此应采取有针对性的措施来提高老年人社会参与水平。","container-title":"当代护士(中旬刊)","DOI":"10.19792/j.cnki.1006-6411.2021.17.033","ISSN":"1006-6411","issue":"6","language":"zh-CN","page":"89-92","source":"CNKI","title":"延吉市某社区老年人社会参与现状及影响因素分析","volume":"28","author":[{"literal":"孙滕滕"},{"literal":"韩丽娜"},{"literal":"吴善玉"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2021"]]}}},{"id":5896,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/IGBTX27F"],"itemData":{"id":5896,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"老年人口再就业对缓解我国人口老龄化造成的经济社会和家庭压力具有重要作用,文章旨在梳理有关退休老年人再就业的原因、影响因素,为下一步的研究提供文献资源支持。","container-title":"中国市场","DOI":"10.13939/j.cnki.zgsc.2018.31.079","ISSN":"1005-6432","issue":"31","language":"zh-CN","page":"79-80","source":"CNKI","title":"退休低龄老年人再就业影响因素文献综述","author":[{"literal":"张正强"},{"literal":"杨晴"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2018"]]}}}],"schema":"https://github.com/citation-style-lan 2021)","noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":4610,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/IIVXE7F6"],"itemData":{"id":4610,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"目的探讨成都市退休低龄老年人的劳动参与行为及影响因素。方法抽取成都市金牛区10个街道273名退休低龄老年人（女性55～64岁,男性60～69岁）开展劳动参与行为相关情况的调查。结果在调查的273名退休低龄老年人中,有约35.9%的退休低龄老年人仍继续参与劳动。性别、学历水平、工作技能职称、居住方式、子女代际经济支持（对子女的代际经济支持）、原退休单位类型、退休金水平,对低龄老年人的劳动参与行为具有显著影响（P<0.05）。结论在人口老龄化问题已经日益凸显的背景下,应当鼓励退休低龄老年人的劳动参与行为,推动实现积极老龄化;关注\"空巢老人\"问题;推动老年教育事业的发展;建立弹性退休制度,研究论证延迟退休年龄政策方案。","container-title":"中国老年学杂志","ISSN":"1005-9202","issue":"23","language":"zh-CN","note":"<北大核心>","page":"5089-5092","source":"CNKI","title":"成都市退休低龄老年人劳动参与行为及影响因素","volume":"40","author":[{"literal":"程朝阳"},{"literal":"于凌云"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2020"]]}}},{"id":5902,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/JTYZVVL2"],"itemData":{"id":5902,"type":"thesis","abstract":"With the continuous development of China’s economy and the continuous improvement of medical technology,the population mortality rate has been greatly reduced,the number of the elderly population in China has been rising,and the aging problem has shown an increasingly severe situation.As early as the millennium,the World Health Organization has put forward the concept of \"active aging\" to deal with the challenges of this century.The report of the Nineteenth National Congress of the Party also pointed out that we should actively deal with the aging of the population and improve the life satisfaction and happiness of the elderly groups.Encouraging and promoting the social participation of older persons is one of the effective ways to achieve their \"active ageing\" goals,through which older persons can have a greater sense of acquisition,happiness and security and make their retirement life more fulfilling,secure and sustainable.As a special group of the elderly,retired teachers in colleges and universities have their own unique value and advantages over the retired elderly in other industries.Active social participation is conducive to alleviating the contradiction between talent supply and demand;at the same time,it also brings great benefits to the elderly themselves,so that the elderly through the channel of social participation,give full play to their professional expertise,while contributing to the society,but also can achieve their own inner pursuit of a better life.This paper mainly focuses on the main line of social participation of retired teachers in colleges and universities,taking retired teachers in several colleges and universities in Anning District of Lanzhou City as the research object,through drawing on the theory of active aging and activity theory,combining with the characteristics of retired teachers’ own social participation,with the help of questionnaire survey,literature research,statistical analysis and other methods to carry out empirical research on the social participation of retired teachers in colleges and universities in Anning District of Lanzhou City.It is found that there are a series of problems in the social participation of retired teachers in colleges and universities,such as imperfect legal mechanism,insufficient participation platform and low participation level.Based on this,this paper puts forward some countermeasures and suggestions on the socialparticipation of retired teachers in Anning District of Lanzhou City from different perspectives.In order to actively deal with aging,enhance the well-being of the elderly group,sense of acquisition,security to provide some reference and reference.","genre":"硕士","language":"zh-CN","note":"DOI: present,the aging of population has become a major problem in the world.China is the country with the largest population,the population aging phenomenon is undoubtedly worthy of attention,especially in the undeveloped economy,the old-age security system is not perfect in the case in the aging of the population,is bound to China’s economic and social fields impact.On February 2016,general secretary Xi Jinping made important instructions,to strengthen the aging work,and stressed that the aging population is related to the overall situation of national development,to actively respond effectively,relates to the well-being of millions of people.Under the current situation of aging population,how to deal with the problem scientifically and effectively,especially how to change the burden of old people into demographic dividend,is a problem worth thinking deeply under the impact of the silver age wave.In September 6,2016,Yin Weimin,Minister of human resources and social security,said that China would develop human resources for the elderly.This policy is mainly aimed at the problem of reality,China’s labor supply and the declining trend of aging deepening,China’s elderly population,aging fast,\"old before rich\" phenomenon is serious,from the current basic situation of our country,whether it is from the technology,experience,or the degree of physical health,our country has been the development of elderly human resource conditions,the development of elderly human resource development is imperative,if used properly,can form second demographic dividend.This group of retired college teachers as the human resources of the old elite in the community especially precious and scarce,they all have rich knowledge and skills,and to develop human resources for the elderly,let their retirement continue to participate in school work,not only is the importance of talent,and will have a huge role in promoting the development of school and society.Based on the definition of retired teachers,human resources and the concept of human resources re-development of retired teachers in colleges and universities,this study makes in-depth interviews with retired teachers in colleges and universities,and analyzes the results of the interviews,and finds out the impact of retraining teachers’ human resources development model,put forward the research hypothesis,and according to the analysis results and hypothesis design research questionnaire,through the empirical study of the questionnaire,concluded that:college retired teachers personal factors in the physical condition,self-ability,self-demand,family factors in the family Economic status,family attitude,social factors in the policy support,channels and opportunities,the pressure of public opinion and college retired teachers are willing to work independently related.Physical condition,family economic situation,family attitude,public opinion pressure and so on are the important factors that affect the individual willingness of retired teachers in colleges and universities.In view of the factors that the retired teachers of the university continue to participate in the individual wishes of the work,combined with the existing literature research and the existing policy system,and makes full development and utilization of the special human resources of retired teachers in colleges and universities.Effective countermeasures and suggestions to enhance the willingness of retired teachers in their own work,so that more retired teachers can give full play to their own advantages,to achieve the value of self-life.","genre":"硕士","language":"zh-CN","publisher":"浙江工业大学","source":"CNKI","title":"高校退休教师人力资源再开发影响因素研究","URL":"https://oversea.cnki.net/kcms/detail/detail.aspx?dbcode=CMFD&dbname=CMFD201802&filename=1018051187.nh&uniplatform=NZKPT&v=LY5grlVjcU5TETZT9FW1bMZFBNrq1ybbfRktnT6DHy4_4HzF-oF7JQ5Z6okddOpr","author":[{"literal":"王美洁"}],"contributor":[{"literal":"方阳春"}],"accessed":{"date-parts":[["2022",5,26]]},"issued":{"date-parts":[["2017"]]}}}],"schema":"https://github.com/citation-style-language/schema/raw/master/csl-citation.json"}

Social engagement has many benefits for health of older adults. The literature describes that personal and environmental factors may act as facilitators or obstacles for levels of social participation of older people. The objective of this systematic review was to examine social participation types most engaged among older people and to analyze factors influencing the social participation of these people. Published articles written in English from 2006 to 2016 were searched from electronic databases, including ScienceDirect, PubMed, and CINAHL databases. The keywords combination used in the search strategy were: social participation, social engagement, social activity, and factors, and aging, or older persons. Ten articles were selected for final review based on defined eligibility criteria.\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The literature revealed that community-based activities were more engaged by older people than individual-based activities. In addition, factors influencing participation in social of older people were health status, and a friendly environment, whereas it was still unclear whether sociodemographic factors were correlated with participation in social of older people. The literature highlighted that more rigorous studies are needed to examine the correlation between factors and social participation of older people. Nurses need to work with others to support and educate significant people regarding friendly environments for older people so that they can engage in social activities, either community- based or individual-based.","container-title":"Pacific Rim International Journal of Nursing Research","ISSN":"2586-8373","issue":"2","language":"en-US","license":"Copyright (c) 2019 Pacific Rim International Journal of Nursing Research","note":"number: 2","page":"131-141","source":"he02.tci-thaijo.org","title":"A Systematic Review of Factors Influencing Social Participation of Older Adults","title-short":"🔤老年人社会参与影响因素的系统评价","volume":"23","author":[{"family":"Wanchai","given":"Ausanee"},{"family":"Phrompayak","given":"Duangjai"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2019",3,27]]}}}],"schema":"https://github.com/citation-style-language/schema/raw/master/csl-citation.json"}

(3)(+0000000): ITEM CSL_CITATION {"citationID":"eMch1Kkv","properties":{"formattedCitation":"(Utz et al., 2002)","plainCitation":"(Utz et al., 2002)","noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":8133,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/MU6RM69Z"],"itemData":{"id":8133,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"PURPOSE: This study evaluated how levels of social participation change as a result of late-life widowhood. Social participation is a multidimensional construct incorporating both formal (e.g., meeting attendance, religious participation, and volunteer obligations) and informal (e.g., telephone contact and social interactions with friends) social roles.\nDESIGN AND METHODS: Using data from the Changing Lives of Older Couples study, analyses compared widowed persons to continuously married control participants to evaluate whether widowhood affects older adults' levels of social participation.\nRESULTS: Widowed persons had higher levels of informal social participation than nonwidowed persons, whereas formal social participation levels were comparable between the two groups. Social participation levels decrease before the death of a spouse, primarily because of poor spousal health, and increase following the loss, because of increased support from friends and relatives.\nIMPLICATIONS: Maintaining continuity in the realm of social participation is a strategy older adults use to cope with spousal loss; however, not all widowed persons have the same resources to alter their levels of social participation.","archive_location":"344 citation(s)","container-title":"The Gerontologist","DOI":"10.1093/geront/42.4.522","ISSN":"0016-9013","issue":"4","journalAbbreviation":"Gerontologist","language":"en-US","note":"PMID: 12145380","page":"522-533","source":"PubMed","title":"The effect of widowhood on older adults' social participation: an evaluation of activity, disengagement, and continuity theories","title-short":"🔤守寡对老年人社会参与的影响：活动、脱离和连续性理论的评估","volume":"42","author":[{"family":"Utz","given":"Rebecca L."},{"family":"Carr","given":"Deborah"},{"family":"Nesse","given":"Randolph"},{"family":"Wortman","given":"Camille B."}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2002",8]]}}}],"schema":"https://github.com/citation-style-language/schema/raw/master/csl-citation.json"}

of socio-economic level,people’s quality of life has been significantly improved,life expectancy has been continuously prolonged,the proportion of the elderly population has risen,the number of working-age population has relatively decreased,and the dependency ratio of the elderly population has increased.The social burden tends to accentuate,the pension supply power drops continuously,these problems all have a great impact on the existing pension system.The World Health Organization（WHO）has put forward the concept of \"positive ageing\" as early as the millennium to deal with the problems of this century.On the one hand,the 60-69 years,many of them are not only healthy but also has rich work experience,social resources and has very strong attachment psychology,the possibility of re-employment is greater.On the other hand,the number of human resources of the young aged population in China is huge,and it has its unique advantages in professional skills,life experience and work experience.Thus,promoting the re-employment of the young can help to make sense for the elderly,in order to relieve the pressure of labor shortage.At present,the theoretical research and practical experience about the re-employment of the young elderly in our country are relatively lacking,especially in the aspects of social concept,policy support and so on.Based on the questionnaire survey of five communities in Lanzhou and the statistical data of Lanzhou Bureau of Statistics,this paper is supported by the theory of positive aging,the theory of human capital and the theory of employment.The logistic binary regression analysis is used to explore the difficulties faced by the young elderly in Lanzhou and the degree of influence among the influencing factors,and then draw the continuous development of China’s economy and the continuous improvement of medical technology,the population mortality rate has been greatly reduced,the number of the elderly population in China has been rising,and the aging problem has shown an increasingly severe situation.As early as the millennium,the World Health Organization has put forward the concept of \"active aging\" to deal with the challenges of this century.The report of the Nineteenth National Congress of the Party also pointed out that we should actively deal with the aging of the population and improve the life satisfaction and happiness of the elderly groups.Encouraging and promoting the social participation of older persons is one of the effective ways to achieve their \"active ageing\" goals,through which older persons can have a greater sense of acquisition,happiness and security and make their retirement life more fulfilling,secure and sustainable.As a special group of the elderly,retired teachers in colleges and universities have their own unique value and advantages over the retired elderly in other industries.Active social participation is conducive to alleviating the contradiction between talent supply and demand;at the same time,it also brings great benefits to the elderly themselves,so that the elderly through the channel of social participation,give full play to their professional expertise,while contributing to the society,but also can achieve their own inner pursuit of a better life.This paper mainly focuses on the main line of social participation of retired teachers in colleges and universities,taking retired teachers in several colleges and universities in Anning District of Lanzhou City as the research object,through drawing on the theory of active aging and activity theory,combining with the characteristics of retired teachers’ own social participation,with the help of questionnaire survey,literature research,statistical analysis and other methods to carry out empirical research on the social participation of retired teachers in colleges and universities in Anning District of Lanzhou City.It is found that there are a series of problems in the social participation of retired teachers in colleges and universities,such as imperfect legal mechanism,insufficient participation platform and low participation level.Based on this,this paper puts (3)(+0000000): ITEM CSL_CITATION {"citationID":"RYUZHy0a","properties":{"formattedCitation":"(Gr\\uc0\\u252{}nwald et al., 2021)","plainCitation":"(Grünwald et al., 2021)","noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":2107,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/6GYP4EIL"],"itemData":{"id":2107,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"OBJECTIVES: Research on retirees' engagement in informal caregiving, formal volunteering, and grandparenting often views retirement as a permanent exit from the workforce. Retirement processes are, however, increasingly diverse: some retire fully while others remain in paid work after retirement from a career job. A relevant but understudied question is how these different retirement processes relate to changes in engagement in unpaid productive activities. Building on role theory, we hypothesize that full and working retirees face different consequences of retirement and, therefore, differ in engagement in unpaid productive activities.\nMETHOD: We analyze data that were collected in 2015 and 2018 among 4,882 Dutch individuals aged 60-65 and employed at baseline. Around half had fully retired at follow-up and 10% worked after their retirement. At follow-up, more respondents are regularly volunteering (from 17% to 27%) and grandparenting (from 39% to 53%) than at baseline, while caregiving remains rather stable (from 33% to 30%).\nRESULTS: Conditional change models show that full retirement is associated with an increased likelihood of volunteering and grandparenting, but not caregiving. Engagement in postretirement work is related to an increased likelihood of looking after the grandchildren, but not to volunteering or providing informal care.\nDISCUSSION: Our findings suggest that volunteering is important for replacing weak ties after full retirement, while grandparenting might be a new, central role in retirement-irrespective of work engagement. Retirees seem to engage in unpaid productive activities for different reasons.","container-title":"The Journals of Gerontology. Series B, Psychological Sciences and Social Sciences","DOI":"10.1093/geronb/gbaa221","ISSN":"1758-5368","issue":"3","journalAbbreviation":"J Gerontol B Psychol Sci Soc Sci","language":"en-US","note":"PMID: 33294930\nPMCID: PMC8611689","page":"607-619","source":"PubMed","title":"The Differential Impact of Retirement on Informal Caregiving, Volunteering, and Grandparenting: Results of a 3-Year Panel Study","title-short":"🔤退休的不同影响非正式的护理,做志愿者,和隔代教养:3年小组研究的结果","volume":"76","author":[{"family":"Grünwald","given":"Olga"},{"family":"Damman","given":"Marleen"},{"family":"Henkens","given":"Kène"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2021",2,17]]}}}],"schema":"https://github.com/citation-style-language/schema/raw/master/csl-citation.json"}

(3)(+0000000): ITEM CSL_CITATION {"citationID":"Um3ArvNF","properties":{"formattedCitation":"(Portegijs et al., 2017; \\uc0\\u20522{}\\uc0\\u24314{}\\uc0\\u26149{}, \\uc0\\u26041{}\\uc0\\u33021{}, 2021; \\uc0\\u26446{}\\uc0\\u24605{}\\uc0\\u23431{}, 2019; \\uc0\\u27573{}\\uc0\\u26690{}\\uc0\\u33395{}, 2012)","plainCitation":"(Portegijs et al., 2017; 倪建春, 方能, 2021; 李思宇, 2019; 段桂艳, 2012)","noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":4561,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/N2334SQ5"],"itemData":{"id":4561,"type":"thesis","abstract":"Aging Population is an irreversible trend. With the active aging concept, the social participation of the elderly is gradually concerned by the academia and the government. This study is based on this background and pays attention to the social participation of the urban elderly. This study specifically pays attention to the urban elderly social participation status, the main factors that affect the urban elderly social participation. This is of great significance to promote the social participation of the elderly and improve the life quality of the elderly.This study’s research objects are Beijing60aged and over, the writer uses systematic random sampling method to collect data by conducting a questionnaire survey in Anhui Li community in the Chaoyang District, Beijing Asian Games Village street. The survey sample contains472elderly people, the writer gets a total of400questionnaires finally, of which306valid questionnaires, the questionnaire response rate is75%.In this study, the concept of social participation is operated into cultural and sports activities, the political activities and the volunteer activities. The measure indexes of cultural and sports activities include13activities, such as playing chess; The measure indexes of political activities include4activities, such as participating in the community’s neighborhood committee and council activities; The measure indexes of volunteer activities include4activities, such as donating money and other things. The participation frequency of each activity is set to \"every day\",\"often\" and \"sometimes\",\"occasionally\" and \"never\". Firstly, the study reflects the social participation status of the old of Anhui Li community from the frequency and scale; and the influence factors on the status of the elderly are followed using multiple regression analysis.The study finds that from the frequency of the elderly social participation, walking/using equipment and chat gatherings have the highest frequency in the cultural and sports activities; neighborhood council has the highest frequency in the political activities; donating money has the highest frequency in the volunteer activities. At the same time, the overall social participation frequency is very low, the three types of activities range from \"never\" and \"occasional\". From the breadth of the elderly social participation, the number of older with breadth1-5is largest in the cultural and sports activities; the number of older with breadth0is most in the political activities; the number of older with breadth1is largest in the volunteer activities.The elderly social participation is an important thing involving the elderly, the elderly family and the community environment. It has nothing with the age, but health. A good health is the foundation of any activity for the elderly. From the data analysis results, the elderly who think they have the better self-rated health status and have a self-assessment outgoing character have calm state of mind and a healthy and do not exclude themselves from the crowd, and are willing to participate in all activities. Length of residence in this community has also become an important factor of the elderly social participation. Length of residence has close contact with a sense of community, the elderly who have a longer residence time are more familiar with this community and don’t rule out activities in the community. However, living in a shorter time especially the elderly who stay less than five years, of which come to Beijing due to their children or other reasons, their social participation degree is very low. They rarely participate in community’s cultural entertainment, political activities and volunteer activities with a very narrow range of the scope of activities and exchanges, a low integration of the community. From the community environment, whether the elderly know the activities is the base of their social participation.","genre":"硕士","language":"zh-CN","publisher":"中央民族大学","source":"CNKI","title":"城市老年人社会参与度研究","URL":"https://oversea.cnki.net/kcms/detail/detail.aspx?filename=1012416325.nh&dbcode=CMFD&dbname=CMFD2012&v=C0JoWLEhhFuYQCnCxCsb7jiPcNSgXdPxwwL5p0j8NF6CrmmAHhSwT1TuNg3p84r_","author":[{"literal":"段桂艳"}],"contributor":[{"literal":"艾斌"}],"accessed":{"date-parts":[["2022",5,13]]},"issued":{"date-parts":[["2012"]]}}},{"id":5923,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/6T5ZXQC4"],"itemData":{"id":5923,"type":"thesis","abstract":"With the rapid development of economy and the decline of fertility rate,birth rate as well as death rate,the proportion of elderly population in China is rising.Under the concept of “active aging”,all sectors of the community pay more attention to the needs and abilities of the elderly group to participate in the society activities.According to the data from the fourth sample Survey of the living conditions of the elderly in China’s Urban and Rural areas,the social participation of the elderly in our country is constantly increasing currently.However,the social participation rate of the elderly both in recreational activities such as games of chess and cards,reading books and newspapers,and in political activities such as community public affairs,or taking part in voluntary activities are less than 50%.Therefore,an empirical study on the social participation behavior and influencing factors of urban elderly groups is beneficial to improve the actual social participation rate of urban elderly groups and their life satisfaction and quality of life.This study mainly adopts the method of random sampling.In order to to obtain primary data,we conduct a questionnaire survey of 360 old people living in Dadukou District of Chongqing City.First of all,we analyze the social participation behavior of the urban elderly group by descriptive statistics,and then compare the differences of the social participation behavior of the urban elderly group from the three categories of personal characteristics,family status and community status,respectively.Finally,we use the four-classification multiple regression model to conduct the empirical analysis.The results show that:（1）There are many factors that influence the social participation behavior of the urban elderly group.The following factors have a significant impact on the social participation behavior of the urban elderly groups,including age,education,physical condition,psychological condition,average monthly income,middle age personality,present personality,family atmosphere,whether they need to look after your grandchildren or great-grandchildren or not,whether they need to undertake the main housework or not,whether the community infrastructure is perfect and complete or not,and whether the community organize regular activities or not.（2）There are three main problems in the social participation behavior of the urban elderly groups at present.The elderly themselves lack correct understanding and social participation ability.Care for the family wholeheartedly,lack of self-space.The community organizations are poor managed and the infrastructure is inadequate.According to the above conclusions,this paper puts forward the relevant recommendations from the three levels such as individual,family,community:（1）The elderly shall establish correct cognition,and strive to improve the ability to participate the society activities.（2）Give the elderly self-space and encourage them to go out of the family.（3）Strengthen community construction and providing the elderly a platform for social participation.","genre":"硕士","language":"zh-CN","note":"DOI: (3)(+0000000): ITEM CSL_CITATION {"citationID":"87YFhU6R","properties":{"formattedCitation":"(\\uc0\\u26446{}\\uc0\\u24605{}\\uc0\\u23431{}, 2019; \\uc0\\u26612{}\\uc0\\u24935{}\\uc0\\u29723{}, 2013)","plainCitation":"(李思宇, 2019; 柴慧琛, 2013)","noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":7993,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/SA2B9MKD"],"itemData":{"id":7993,"type":"thesis","abstract":"随着人口老龄化问题的不断加剧,我国城市退休老年人口也在急剧增多,城市退休老年人已经成为我国一个不容忽视的社会群体。由于社会职业角色、生活环境、人际交往发生的变化,退休老人往往会出现各种适应性难题。他们能否比较快地适应退休生活、能否迅速实现社会角色的转换、能否重新融入城市社会是关系每一位退休老人生存与发展的重大问题,而社会参与是解决城市退休老年人所面临的这些问题的一个重要途径。因此,对城市退休老年人社会参与的研究,可以清楚地了解退休老年人社会参与的基本状况,分析影响退休老年人社会参与的因素,进而可以准确探讨社会参与对城市退休老年人的影响,因而,对城市退休老年人社会参与的研究具有很强的理论和现实意义。本研究从活动理论和积极老龄化理论视角展开论述,运用质性研究的研究方法,对山东省济南市Q社区的15位退休老年人进行深度访谈,调查他们的个人基本情况、社会参与状况,进而分析影响其社会参与的因素以及社会参与对退休老年人生活状况的影响。通过调查研究发现,目前我国城市绝大多数城市退休老年人拥有较多的空闲时间和良好的身体条件,因而具备了社会参与的良好条件,但是总体而言,社会参与的情况并不是很乐观,也就是说,绝大多数的城市退休老人的闲暇生活的安排没成系统性,仍处于自由利用状态,也并没有积极主动投入到社会参与之中,参与的水平还比较低。研究表明,社会参与是城市退休老年人适应新的生活环境的一种有效途径,而如何提高老年人社会参与就需要充分发挥政府、组织、社区的作用。政府方面应该完善相应的制度和政策,加大对退休老年人社会参与的资金投入,通过完善老年人社会参与的机制,保障参与渠道的顺畅；社会应该突破传统观念的限制,重视老年人的价值。老年人不仅需要“有所医”“有所养”更需要“有所为”“有所乐”,才能确保老年人积极主动参与,才能保证社会参与质量的提高；社区方面,应该改善社区环境,推进社区建设,为老年人搭建各种社会参与的平台,并根据老年人的兴趣爱好、健康状况和受教育程度有针对性地开展各项活动；退休老年人自身要转变思想观念,对退休应该有正确的认识,树立正确的社会参与意识,同时应该善于利用自身条件,积极参与社会；最后,专业社会工作者应该协助老年人整合资源,并结合老年人的需求,开展相应的活动。","genre":"硕士","language":"zh-CN","publisher":"山东大学","source":"CNKI","title":"城市退休老人的社会参与状况及影响因素研究","URL":"https://chn.oversea.cnki.net/kcms/detail/detail.aspx?dbcode=CMFD&dbname=CMFD201302&filename=1013220257.nh&uniplatform=NZKPT&v=gtluOqL4vfBhZ1RK2V9NFtrWF_TCeLLzse40C5mBa8HTWmejkjmEGhRtlfqrD0-C","author":[{"literal":"柴慧琛"}],"contributor":[{"literal":"程胜利"}],"accessed":{"date-parts":[["2022",6,22]]},"issued":{"date-parts":[["2013"]]}}},{"id":5923,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/6T5ZXQC4"],"itemData":{"id":5923,"type":"thesis","abstract":"With (3)(+0000000): ITEM CSL_CITATION {"citationID":"laFbIctV","properties":{"formattedCitation":"(2012)","plainCitation":"(2012)","noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":546,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/5VIZ8LQR"],"itemData":{"id":546,"type":"thesis","abstract":"Using a retirement arrangement does not necessarily mean that people retire fulltime. The phenomenon of bridge employment, already studied in the US, becomes increasingly popular among older adults in the Netherlands. The question is to what extent bridge employment can be beneficial for well-being of older adults during the retirement process, especially for older workers who are confronted with involuntary retirement. It is often noted that involuntary retirement is detrimental for well-being. However, it can be presumed that having a bridge job after this negative event can buffer the negative consequences for well-being. Multilevel longitudinal random intercept models and fixed effects models on the ‘NIDI Work and Retirement Panel’ data show that well-being is lower for people who experienced their retirement as forced. However, forced retirees who regained control over the retirement process by taking a bridge job do not seem to have lower levels of well-being compared to workers still in their main career job. KEYWORDS: subjective well-being ▪ bridge employment ▪ involuntary retirement ▪ multilevel longitudinal models","genre":"Master’s thesis","language":"en-US","publisher":"Tilburg University","title":"Bridge employment after early retirement: A bridge to better postretirement well-being of older adults?","title-short":"🔤桥提前退休后就业:一座桥,以便更好地赚钱的老年人的幸福感?","URL":"https://pure.knaw.nl/ws/files/465056/Dingemans,_2012,_bridge_employment_after_early_retirement,_NETSPAR_THESES_2012-035,_file128869.pdf","author":[{"family":"Dingemans","given":"Ellen"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2012",5,31]]}},"label":"page","suppress-author":true}],"schema":"https://github.com/citation-style-language/schema/raw/master/csl-citation.json"}

(3)(+0000000): ITEM CSL_CITATION {"citationID":"BrPo42QG","properties":{"formattedCitation":"(2019)","plainCitation":"(2019)","noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":1202,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/SNT2QUMI"],"itemData":{"id":1202,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"Much research has sought to understand how people construct their careers; however, only little is known about the career construction of older workers. To understand how people construct their careers in later life, we take a lifespan development perspective on career construction theory. Specifically, we propose and test a model in which we take a closer look at older workers’ career adaptability and aging experience (i.e., physical loss, social loss, personal growth, and gaining self-knowledge) as relevant factors shaping their late career planning. Moreover, we explore whether these relationships are mediated by older workers’ occupational future time perspective as an important underlying mechanism between adaptability resources (i.e., career adaptability), experiences (i.e., aging experience), and adapting responses (i.e., late career planning). We test our model with two-wave longitudinal data from a sample of older workers (aged 50 to 79) based in the United Kingdom. Results show that occupational future time perspective mediated the positive effects of career adaptability and personal growth, as well as the negative effect of physical loss on late career planning. Overall, our findings contribute to a better understanding of late career construction and offers practical implications for older workers to purse activities that help them to successfully plan their late career.","container-title":"Journal of Vocational Behavior","DOI":"10.1016/j.jvb.2018.10.006","ISSN":"00018791","journalAbbreviation":"Journal of Vocational Behavior","language":"en-US","page":"24-38","source":"DOI.org (Crossref)","title":"Is the future still open? (3)(+0000000): ITEM CSL_CITATION {"citationID":"EnWdbZbI","properties":{"formattedCitation":"(2019)","plainCitation":"(2019)","noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":1733,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/K4JT66HK"],"itemData":{"id":1733,"type":"thesis","abstract":"Objectives1.To explore the effect of self-perception aging on the psychological well-being of the elderly in community.2.To test the mediating effect of social participation on self-perceived aging and psychological well-being.MethodsFrom September 2017 to August 2018,850 elderly people from six typical communities in Tangshan City were conveniently selected as subjects.Using the Aging Perceptions Questionnaire（APQ）,Social Participation Scale and Psychological Well-being Questionnaire in Multiple Happiness Questionnaire（MHQ）was used to investigate the self-perceived aging degree,social participation degree and psychological well-being level of the elderly in the community.Meanwhile,self-designed general situation questionnaire,Family APGAR index and ability assessment scale of the elderly were used to investigate the influencing factors of psychological well-being.The data were analyzed by SPSS17.0statistical software.The influencing factors of psychological well-being of the elderly were analyzed by t-test,one-way ANOVA and multiple linear regression.Pearson correlation analysis was used to analyze the correlation among self-perceived aging,social participation and psychological well-being.We analyzed the mediating effect between self-perceived aging and psychological well-being by using Wen Zhonglin’s mediating effect test procedure.Results1.The total score of psychological well-being of the elderly in the community was（156.04±25.93）.The level of psychological well-being was in the upper middle level.2.The results of single factor analysis showed that there were significant differences in the level of psychological well-being among age,marital status,educational level,monthly income,family structure,change of perception function,community function,family care,positive perception aging and negative perception aging（all P<0.05）.There was no significant difference in the level of psychological well-being between different genders（P>0.05）.3.Multivariate linear stratified regression analysis showed that monthly income,changes in perceived function,community function,family care,positive self-perception aging and negative self-perception aging affected the elderly’s psychological well-being.In the first layer,the adjusted R2 is 0.418 when the positive perception aging is not included in the regression equation,and when the positive perception aging is included in the second layer,the adjusted R2 is 0.482.Positive perception aging can explain 6.4%of the total variation of the elderly’s psychological well-being.In the second layer,when the negative perception aging is not included in the regression equation,the adjusted R2 is0.482,when the negative perception aging is included in the third layer,the adjusted R2 is0.552,and the negative perception aging can explain 7%of the total variation of the elderly’s psychological well-being.4 Pearson correlation analysis showed that social participation was positively correlated with psychological well-being and positive perception aging（r=0.593,0.303,P<0.05）,negatively correlated with negative perception aging（r=-0.305,P<0.05）,positively correlated with positive perception aging（r=0.463,P<0.05）,negatively correlated with negative perception aging（r=-0.518,P<0.05）.5.The results of mediating effect showed that social participation had a partial mediating effect between positive perception aging and psychological well-being（P<0.05）,the mediating effect was 0.151,the direct effect was0.312 and the total effect is 0.463.The contribution rate of mediating effect to the total effect was Ettect M=0.303*0.499/0.463=32.6%.Social participation had a partial mediating effect between negative perception aging and psychological well-being（P<0.05）.The mediation effect was-0.305*0.480=-0.146,the direct effect was-0.371 and the total effect was-0.518.The contribution rate of mediation effect to the total effect was Ettect M=-0.305*0.480/-0.518=28.2%.Conclusions1.The psychological well-being of the elderly in the community is on the upper middle level.2.Monthly income,change of perception function,community function,family care,positive self-perception aging and negative self-perception aging are the influencing factors of psychological well-being of the elderly in the community.Improving the positive self-perception aging level of the elderly and reducing the negative self-perception aging level of the elderly will help to improve their psychological well-being level.3.Social participation plays a mediating role between positive perception of aging,negative perception of aging and psychological well-being of the elderly.Improving the level of positive self-perception of aging of the elderly and reducing the level of negative self-perception of aging of the elderly can improve their level of social participation,and then improve their psychological well-being.Figure 1;Table 9;Reference 106","genre":"硕士","language":"zh-CN","publisher":"华北理工大学","source":"CNKI","title":"自我感知老化对社区老年人心理幸福感的影响：社会参与的中介作用","URL":"https://oversea.cnki.net/KCMS/detail/detail.aspx?dbcode=CMFD&dbname=CMFD202001&filename=1019669751.nh&uniplatform=OVERSEAS_EN&v=Q5DV7XQ4OUPX-XwADMKF4gokzlEuOSeLvIQ_B7JvWQv_UkxHlIwZFGl1rTgrwUhE","author":[{"literal":"白亚丽"}],"contributor":[{"literal":"赵雅宁"}],"accessed":{"date-parts":[["2022",4,2]]},"issued":{"date-parts":[["2019"]]}},"label":"page","suppress-author":true}],"schema":"https://github.com/citation-style-language/schema/raw/master/csl-citation.json"}

(3)(+0000000): ITEM CSL_CITATION {"citationID":"UBBJ05mS","properties":{"formattedCitation":"(2022)","plainCitation":"(2022)","noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":8220,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/5UY3JUA2"],"itemData":{"id":8220,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"Objective\nWe aimed to examine the association between social participation and depressive symptoms among Chinese older people aged 65 years or above to supplement limited studies in China on this topic.\n\nMethods\nThis community-based longitudinal prospective cohort study used the data from the Chinese Longitudinal Healthy Longevity Survey (CLHLS, baseline in 2014 and a follow-up in 2018). Depressive symptoms were assessed using the 10-item Center for Epidemiologic Studies Depression Scale. Social participation was assessed using a composite index by considering the frequency for the two types of social activity: organized social activities and informal activities. Pearson's χ2 test was used to correlate the characteristics of participants with social participation or depressive symptoms. Log-binomial regression models were used to assess the association between social participation and the risk of depressive symptoms.\n\nResults\nThe incidence of depressive symptoms was 28.8% among 2,200 participants in 2018 after a 4-year follow-up. Participants with no social participation (32.6%), organized social activities (30.6%), or informal social activities (31.2%) were more likely to have depressive symptoms. After the adjustment of demographic factors, socioeconomic status, lifestyle habits, and health status, in comparison with older people who often engaged in social participation, organized social activities, and informal social activities, the risk of depressive symptoms was 45% [adjusted risk ratio (aRR): 1.45, 95% CI: 1.16–1.82], 42% (aRR: 1.45, 95% CI: 1.02–2.00), and 29% (aRR: 1.29, 95% CI: 1.02–1.99) higher among older people with no social participation and who never engaged in organized social activities and informal social activities, respectively.\n\nConclusions\nThis study showed that the lack of social participation, including organized social activities and informal social activities, was associated with a higher risk of depressive symptoms after 4 years among older adults in China. Our findings shed lights into the feasibility of promoting social participation to reduce the risk of depressive symptoms and promote longevity and healthy aging among older adults.","archive_location":"0 citation(s)","call-number":"3.709","container-title":"Frontiers in Public Health","DOI":"10.3389/fpubh.2022.781771","ISSN":"2296-2565","journalAbbreviation":"Front Public Health","note":"PMID: 35223728\nPMCID: PMC8863664","page":"781771","source":"3","title":"Less Social Participation Is Associated With a Higher Risk of Depressive Symptoms Among Chinese Older Adults: A Community-Based Longitudinal Prospective Cohort Study","title-short":"Less Social Participation Is Associated With a Higher Risk of Depressive Symptoms Among Chinese Older Adults","volume":"10","author":[{"family":"Du","given":"Min"},{"family":"Dai","given":"Wanwei"},{"family":"Liu","given":"Jue"},{"family":"Tao","given":"Jing"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2022",2,9]]}},"label":"page","suppress-author":true}],"schema":"https://github.com/citation-style-language/schema/raw/master/csl-citation.json"}

(3)(+0000000): ITEM CSL_CITATION {"citationID":"vZPlReKU","properties":{"formattedCitation":"(R. Curtis et al., 2016)","plainCitation":"(R. Curtis et al., 2016)","noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":"CxMgfsYo/q3XskQv0","uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/58REE5KL"],"itemData":{"id":8335,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"Objectives:\nPerceived control may promote social activity in older adults because individuals with greater perceived control have greater confidence in their ability to achieve outcomes and are more likely to choose difficult activities, show persistence, and employ strategies to overcome challenges. Cross-sectional research has linked perceived control with social activity in life span and older adult samples but provides little insight into the direction of influence. We examined reciprocal associations between perceived control and social activity in order to establish temporal sequencing, which is one prerequisite for determining potential causation.\n\nMethod:\nParticipants were 14,126 midlife and older adults from the German Ageing Survey. Using cross-lagged autoregressive modeling with age as the time metric (40–87 years), we examined reciprocal 3-year lagged associations between perceived control and social activity, while controlling for concurrent associations.\n\nResults:\nPerceived control significantly predicted social activity 3 years later. Reciprocally, social activity significantly predicted perceived control 3 years later. The influence of perceived control on social activity was greater than the influence of social activity on perceived control.\n\nDiscussion:\nThe finding that perceived control significantly predicts future social activity has potential implications for developing interventions aimed at promoting social activity in midlife and older adults.","archive_location":"12 citation(s)","container-title":"The Journals of Gerontology Series B: Psychological Sciences and Social Sciences","DOI":"10.1093/geronb/gbw070","journalAbbreviation":"The Journals of Gerontology Series B: Psychological Sciences and Social Sciences","page":"807-815","source":"ResearchGate","title":"Perceived Control and Social Activity in Midlife and Older Age: A Reciprocal Association? These roles include those of child, pupil or student, leisurite, citizen, worker, spouse, homemaker, parent, and pensioner, positions with associated expectations that are occupied at some time by most people, and other less common roles such as those of criminal, reformer, and lover. A Life-Career Rainbow is presented as a means of helping conceptualize multidimensional careers, the temporal involvement in, and the emotional commitment to, each role. Self-actualization in various roles, role conflicts, and the determinants of role selection and of role performance are discussed. The use of the Rainbow in career education and in counseling is briefly considered.","container-title":"Journal of Vocational Behavior","DOI":"10/fvk7c8","journalAbbreviation":"Journal of Vocational Behavior","language":"en","page":"282-298","source":"ResearchGate","title":"A Life-Span, Life-Space Approach to Career Development","volume":"16","author":[{"family":"Super","given":"Donald"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["1980",6,1]]}},"label":"page","suppress-author":true}],"schema":"https://github.com/citation-style-language/schema/raw/master/csl-citation.json"}

(3)(+0000001): ITEM CSL_CITATION {"citationID":"zCWltfQf","properties":{"formattedCitation":"(\\uc0\\u20911{}\\uc0\\u22025{}\\uc0\\u24935{}, 2019; \\uc0\\u38472{}\\uc0\\u20013{}\\uc0\\u20848{}, 2020)","plainCitation":"(冯嘉慧, 2019; 陈中兰, 2020)","noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":10144,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/53NLYZH3"],"itemData":{"id":10144,"type":"thesis","abstract":"我国正处于由制造大国向制造强国的转型期,需要大量技术技能型人才与之配套,而中职学生作为社会劳动力的重要组成部分,其职业生涯的发展与社会的发展是息息相关的。此外,2018年教育部印发《中等职业学校职业指导工作规定》,明确指出要培养学生规划管理学业、职业生涯的意识和能力,但中职学生高离职率、高转业率的现实情况也反映出学生的职业生涯规划存在诸多问题有待解决。舒伯作为世界职业规划与生涯教育领域权威的代表人物,他打开了一个全新的视角,推动职业生涯规划静态的人职匹配到动态的生涯持续发展,其成熟的生涯发展理论已得到多个国家的运用和国内专家学者的肯定,对我国中职学生职业生涯规划有着重要的借鉴价值和意义。生涯发展理论以自我概念作为基础核心,以生涯成熟度作为测量,并提出生涯发展拱门模式、五阶段发展理论、循环式发展理论、生涯彩虹图等观点。该理论与职业生涯规划的本质是契合相融的,都在突出强调了个体的主体地位。结合我国中职学生的现状,舒伯生涯发展理论可使我国的职业生涯规划更具科学性和有效性,提供新的指导方向和理念。本研究以舒伯的生涯发展理论为基点,首先,从学生的视角出发研究中职学生职业生涯规划的现状,并分析和梳理实践中存在的问题。之后借鉴舒伯生涯发展理论有价值的成分,以学生、学校、社会三大主线进行原因探究,并试图针对学生职业生涯规划存在的问题及背后的原因,提出相应的改进对策。中职学生应提高职业生涯规划认知,正确认识职业生涯、加强构建自我概念、学会转化角色扮演、全面提高生涯成熟度、明确个人职业目标;中职学校应加强引导,树立动态发展的职业生涯规划理念、健全专业的职业生涯规划组织、开拓多样化生涯规划指导渠道、分阶段指导学生职业生涯规划以及提高教师专业化指导水平;社会各界应寻求各方的合作支持,政府提供政策保障、企业产教融合寻求实践机会以及家庭教育有效引导,力求可以改善中职学生的职业生涯规划现状,实现个体的良好发展。","genre":"硕士","language":"zh","note":"DOI: 10.27711/d.cnki.gtjgc.2020.000032","publisher":"天津职业技术师范大学","source":"CNKI","title":"舒伯生涯发展理论视角下中职学生职业生涯规划现状及对策研究","URL":"https://chn.oversea.cnki.net/KCMS/detail/detail.aspx?dbcode=CMFD&dbname=CMFD202001&filename=1020622330.nh&uniplatform=OVERSEA&v=jsAYAU4WdUDkd6pw7ybDhvGc4qdmiUVCCTYZoU95xmKx9cH4CxREIOQtEoYViJUw","author":[{"literal":"陈中兰"}],"accessed":{"date-parts":[["2023",3,10]]},"issued":{"date-parts":[["2020"]]}}},{"id":10145,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/KG8IJ6CI"],"itemData":{"id":10145,"type":"thesis","abstract":"如何构建生涯教育课程体系、提升广大中小学生涯指导水平,这是当前深化基础教育课程改革、稳步推进“新高考”任务的重要抓手,也是加强学校与社会联系、落实立德树人根本任务的内在要求。美国作为较早开展生涯指导实践和理论研究的国家,在该领域积累了丰富的经验。然而当前国内外关于美国生涯指导研究多属于个别人物、流派的碎片化研究,缺乏基于范式的系统梳理和通观把握。批判吸收美国生涯指导理论研究相关成果,对学界把握生涯指导学术脉络、构建适切本土的生涯指导框架有借鉴意义。贯穿本研究的核心问题:在“效率”与“民主”、“科学主义”与“人本主义”的话语竞斗中,美国学界分化出哪些有影响的理论范式?围绕这一核心问题进一步追问:哪些关键因素影响了这些理论范式的形成和发展?这些理论范式之间有哪些不同的学术主张?这些理论范式的背后渗透怎样的价值取向?这些不同的价值取向是如何根植在话语权力结构当中的?对我国生涯指导理论与实践研究有哪些重要的启示?这些问题构成了本研究的内在逻辑线索。论文首先讨论了社会转型与美国生涯指导的发展,分别从美国早期工业社会、晚期工业社会和信息化社会考察各个历史时期的生涯指导理论的发展形态。研究发现,杜威从生涯指导理论酝酿时期开始就以倡导“普职融合”、“通过职业的教育”的方式进入这个领域并成为这领域的重要人物。最初杜威推崇的生涯教育理想并不被重视,但在20世纪晚期兴起的生涯教育运动中赢得了广泛的认可和支持。在“返回杜威”的口号中,杜威再次成为美国生涯指导研究领域的关键人物。论文接着聚焦美国生涯指导发展历程中的不同理论范式内部的共同纲领以及它们之间的话语冲突,尤其重视不同话语之间的价值取向与话语权力之争。具体而言,即三个理论范式之争:一是以霍兰德模式为代表的职业选择理论范式;二是以舒伯模式为代表的生涯发展理论范式;三是以生涯教育运动为代表的生涯教育理论范式。三者之间,前两者可统称为生涯咨询范式。通过分析三种范式内在及之间的争斗历程,发掘潜藏在生涯指导理论背后的发展逻辑,进而为批判吸收美国相关研究成果并结合本土实际构建适切本土的生涯指导框架提供参照。本研究发现,不同的生涯指导理论隐含了研究者不同的价值取向,主要显示为效率主义与民主主义之争及其衍生出的科学主义与人本主义之争。价值取向的差异导致了研究者对人与职业关系的不同理解,效率主义和科学主义在人职关系问题上往往关注以职业为中心的人职匹配。民主主义和人本主义在人职关系问题上往往重视“当事...","genre":"博士","language":"zh","note":"DOI: 10.27149/d.cnki.ghdsu.2019.000151","publisher":"华东师范大学","source":"CNKI","title":"美国生涯指导理论范式研究","URL":"https://chn.oversea.cnki.net/KCMS/detail/detail.aspx?dbcode=CDFD&dbname=CDFDLAST2020&filename=1020604021.nh&uniplatform=OVERSEA&v=JJw7W3xW97UxoQzGLl13LMf1p9nWu-EX59DZeqpk3hodxc1QhbgukHsAXHD4WhVc","author":[{"literal":"冯嘉慧"}],"accessed":{"date-parts":[["2023",3,10]]},"issued":{"date-parts":[["2019"]]}}}],"schema":"https://github.com/citation-style-language/schema/raw/master/csl-citation.json"}

(3)(+0000000): ITEM CSL_CITATION {"citationID":"Vm6ghAEP","properties":{"formattedCitation":"(\\uc0\\u39640{}\\uc0\\u31168{}\\uc0\\u23071{}, 2013)","plainCitation":"(高秀娟, 2013)","noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":10161,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/C85CY2N3"],"itemData":{"id":10161,"type":"thesis","abstract":"目的:构建符合我国护理实践状况的职业生涯早期文职护士职业成熟度他评量表，为文职护士的考核、任用提供客观的参照标准，为考评文职护士职业发展状况提供依据，使人力资源的管理有据可依，也为评价培训效果提供参考，以促进文职护士职业发展。方法：通过文献回顾、专家咨询及预试验，形成职业生涯早期文职护士职业成熟度他评量表；再以此研究工具对军队医院253名处于职业生涯早期的文职护士实施测评，应用SPSS16.0统计软件进行数据分析，进一步验证量表的信效度，并分析职业成熟度现状及相关影响因素。结果：①构建出以职业生涯早期文职护士职业成熟度定义为基础的职业成熟度框架和评价指标体系。职业生涯早期文职护士职业成熟度他评量表，由职业态度、职业适应、职业探索3个一级指标、6个二级指标、18个三级指标和48个条目组成，具有良好的信度和效度。②文职护士的职业成熟度水平中等略偏上，在学历、职称变量上有显著性差异。通过他评与自评得到的结果无相关性。结论：完成了职业生涯早期文职护士职业成熟度他评量表的编制。初步分析了发展现状及相关影响因素。建立系统、有效的文职护士职业成熟度他评量表，可为文职护士的任用、培训、评价提供客观、可量化的依据，为评价培训效果提供客观的标准。","genre":"硕士","language":"zh","publisher":"山西医科大学","source":"CNKI","title":"职业生涯早期文职护士职业成熟度他评量表的研制","URL":"https://chn.oversea.cnki.net/KCMS/detail/detail.aspx?dbcode=CMFD&dbname=CMFD201402&filename=1013223581.nh&uniplatform=OVERSEA&v=b2FuNc1NZ7lNVhfY4XqBNIexo_OnOKEG6D0gtnqNUe5GzHZVCvTWFN99t-IW32nA","author":[{"literal":"高秀娟"}],"accessed":{"date-parts":[["2023",3,10]]},"issued":{"date-parts":[["2013"]]}}}],"schema":"https://github.com/citation-style-language/schema/raw/master/csl-citation.json"}

(3)(+0000000): ITEM CSL_CITATION {"citationID":"Hwir0TOs","properties":{"formattedCitation":"(\\uc0\\u29579{}\\uc0\\u33311{}\\uc0\\u24378{} \\uc0\\u31561{}, 2021)","plainCitation":"(王舟强 等, 2021)","noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":10166,"uris":["http://zotero.org/groups/4709411/items/F9M3BUTQ"],"itemData":{"id":10166,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"目的探讨分析四川省各地市州的医疗工作质量,分析总结各地市州医疗工作质量发展状况,制定相应政策提供科学依据,促进各地市州医疗工作质量的可持续发展。方法通过文献分析法从工作强度指标、工作效率指标、医疗费用指标3个维度构成的评价指标体系,采用基于自助法(Bootstrap)抽样的平行分析法进行评价。结果构造主成分综合评价函数对21个地市州进行排序,排名前三位的是A1,A4,A10地市州。评价结果与四川省的实际情况基本相符。结论以传统的因子分析法存在严重的估计偏度问题,采用基于Bootstrap抽样思想的平行分析方法,可以校正这一偏差。研究结果为医疗工作质量综合评价提供了一个新的思路和方法。","container-title":"现代预防医学","ISSN":"1003-8507","issue":"18","language":"zh","page":"3341-3344","source":"CNKI","title":"基于平行分析法的医疗工作质量小样本数据分析研究","volume":"48","author":[{"literal":"王舟强"},{"literal":"吴小琴"},{"literal":"王扬勇"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2021"]]}}}],"schema":"https://github.com/citation-style-language/schema/raw/master/csl-citation.json"}

(3)(+0000000): ITEM CSL_CITATION {"citationID":"ci8d5wHB","properties":{"formattedCitation":"(\\uc0\\u23380{}\\uc0\\u26126{} \\uc0\\u31561{}, 2007; \\uc0\\u30000{}\\uc0\\u37329{}\\uc0\\u26041{} \\uc0\\u31561{}, 2012; \\uc0\\u39640{}\\uc0\\u30707{} \\uc0\\u31561{}, 2015)","plainCitation":"(孔明 等, 2007; 田金方 等, 2012; 高石 等, 2015)","noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":10163,"uris":["http://zotero.org/groups/4709411/items/D4X4KJSG"],"itemData":{"id":10163,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"在探索性因子分析中,决定因子的提取数至关重要。平行分析是确定因子提取数较为常用的方法。目前国内的心理学研究较多使用主成分方法下的平行分析,对主轴方法下的平行分析则鲜有论及。本研究介绍了主轴方法下平行分析的原理,并以具体实例说明了该方法在心理统计中的具体运用,希望藉此解决以传统方法确定因子提取数所存在的问题。","container-title":"心理学探新","ISSN":"1003-5184","issue":"5","language":"zh","page":"471-473","source":"CNKI","title":"探索性因子分析中主轴法下的平行分析","volume":"35","author":[{"literal":"高石"},{"literal":"杨莉萍"},{"literal":"白福宝"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2015"]]}}},{"id":10165,"uris":["http://zotero.org/groups/4709411/items/893M2BZY"],"itemData":{"id":10165,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"平行分析是探索性因素分析中用来确定所保留的因子个数的一种方法。探索性因素分析中常用的确定因子个数的方法有特征值大于1准则和碎石图,但这两种方法又各有不足。平行分析则为探索性因素分析中所保留因子个数的确定提供了另一种新思路。本文详细介绍了平行分析的步骤、潜在逻辑以及进行平行分析所用的软件,并通过实例来说明其在探索性因素分析中如何应用。","container-title":"心理科学","DOI":"10/grwwzz","ISSN":"1671-6981","issue":"4","language":"zh","page":"924-925+918","source":"CNKI","title":"平行分析在探索性因素分析中的应用","author":[{"literal":"孔明"},{"literal":"卞冉"},{"literal":"张厚粲"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2007"]]}}},{"id":10169,"uris":["http://zotero.org/groups/4709411/items/TTA6AY8U"],"itemData":{"id":10169,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"文章首先评述了六种成份选择方法的优缺点,然后基于BOOSTRAP抽样思想改进了Horn的平行分析方法,并利用随机模拟技术比较分析了改进方法的优越性。结果表明:BOOSTRAP平行分析关于样本容量和样本分布都是一致有效和稳定的,能够正确地辨识出需要提出的成份个数,而Horn的平行分析仅在大样本和正态分布情况下才能达到BOOSTRAP平行分析的效度。","container-title":"统计与决策","DOI":"10/grww2v","ISSN":"1002-6487","issue":"23","language":"zh","page":"4-8","source":"CNKI","title":"基于BOOSTRAP抽样的平行分析方法及其模拟研究","author":[{"literal":"田金方"},{"literal":"陈珮珮"},{"literal":"张小斐"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2012"]]}}}],"schema":"https://github.com/citation-style-language/schema/raw/master/csl-citation.json"}

(3)(+0000000): ITEM CSL_CITATION {"citationID":"uFbNZfaR","properties":{"formattedCitation":"(\\uc0\\u20219{}\\uc0\\u19990{}\\uc0\\u31168{} et al., 2020; \\uc0\\u24429{}\\uc0\\u23159{}, 2019; 2022)","noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":9315,"uris":["http://zotero.org/groups/4709411/items/PX8BX4W7"],"itemData":{"id":9315,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"目的研究探索性结构方程模型(ESEM)相对于传统的基于验证性因子分析(CFA)的结构方程模型(SEM)在系统家庭动力量表使用中的优越性。方法采用系统家庭动力自评量表对6115名大中学生进行调查,以其中的5997份有效数据进行分析,应用Mplus7.0结构方程软件对同一数据分别进行传统结构方程模型和探索性结构方程模型分析。结果基于CFA的结构方程对数据的拟合度达不到基本的拟合指标要求,而ESEM则可以达到其要求。结论在系统家庭动力量表的研究中,可考虑使用探索性结构方程模型。","container-title":"中国卫生统计","ISSN":"1002-3674","issue":"06","language":"zh_CN","page":"936-938","source":"CNKI","title":"探索性结构方程在系统家庭动力量表中的应用","volume":"31","author":[{"literal":"曾伟楠"},{"literal":"赵旭东"},{"literal":"万崇华"},{"literal":"马泽威"},{"literal":"于磊"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2014"]]}}},{"id":9423,"uris":["http://zotero.org/groups/4709411/items/FPWZW8PR"],"itemData":{"id":9423,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"目的开发适用的简版独处行为量表。方法对天津和山东两所高校的大学生进行施测, 保留有效数据2 484份, 基于探索性结构方程模型(exploratory structural equation model, ESEM)和项目反应理论的拓展分步评分模型(generalized partial credit model, GPCM)对量表进行简化。对贵州省100名在校大学生间隔2个月进行重测, 用于计算简版量表的重测信度。采用R语言、Mplus 8.0和SPSS 24.0进行数据分析。结果根据ESEM和GPCM的结果, 独处行为量表共删除18道题目, 保留积极独处、孤僻、社交回避和孤独4个因子共16...","container-title":"中华行为医学与脑科学杂志","ISSN":"1674-6554","issue":"02","language":"zh_CN","page":"174-179","source":"CNKI","title":"简版独处行为量表的修订及信效度分析","volume":"31","author":[{"literal":"罗杰"},{"literal":"芦旭蓉"},{"literal":"刘拓"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2022"]]}}},{"id":10113,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/MZ6X88H5"],"itemData":{"id":10113,"type":"thesis","abstract":"政治认同近年来逐渐成为政治学、心理学等学者们研究的热点问题之一。但是国内现在针对政治认同系统、科学的个案和实证研究成果相对缺乏,特别是将理论分析与实证研究有机结合起来、针对公职人员的实证研究较少。政治认同是人们在社会政治生活中产生的对政治体系一种情感和意识上的归属感及其行为表现。自我认同是个体在与环境的互动中形成的对自我的感知,而心理弹性指面对逆境等环境时的适应能力,很多研究表明自我认同和心理弹性能够影响政治认同水平。自我认同和心理弹性水平越高,政治认同也会呈现较高的水平,因此,本研究通过查阅文献确定政治认同的内涵和结构,编制出公职人员政治认同量表,并对当前公职人员政治认同水平进行测量,且进一步探讨公职人员政治认同、心理弹性与自我认同三者之间的关系。研究首先通过文献归纳总结研究方式,拟定了政治认同的理论结构,运用演绎法和访谈法编制量表题目的同时,还运用了德尔菲法,经过多次专家咨询完成原始题库编制。专家对问卷进行通俗度检验后,在某省内选取被试,最后收回初测问卷310份。通过项目分析与探索结构分析的方法,初步确定了14个题项的正式政治认同量表。随后在某两省回收数据658份,包括了性别等人口学变量指标,采用内部一致性信度、重测信度检验量表信度,采用内容效度、结构效度及效标关联效度来检验量表效度。最后对公职人员政治认同水平进行整体状况分析,同时探讨公职人员自我认同、心理弹性和政治认同的关系,通过数据整理分析得出如下结论:1.自编的公职人员政治认同量表包括三个维度:政治认知、政治情感和政治行为,其信效度良好:政治认同总分与各维度分的内部一致性信度均在0.70以上;内容效度方面,在最初编制量表时候就先在半结构访谈基础上再进行了两次专家咨询编写了原始题库,在后期量表编制过程中,也随时咨询专家意见;结构效度中,验证性因子分析显示公职人员政治认同量表结构拟合符合标准,效标关联效度分析显示,公职人员政治认同与政治参与和政治沟通存在着中度正相关,符合理论推导,可用于公职人员政治认同测量。2.公职人员政治认同得分总体来看呈近似正态分布,大部分处于中上水平;公职人员政治认同总体及各维度水平均为中等偏上;在人口学变量上存在显著差异。3.公职人员心理弹性在自我认同和政治认同之间起着部分中介作用。","genre":"硕士","language":"zh","note":"DOI: 10.27048/d.cnki.ggzsu.2019.000300","publisher":"贵州师范大学","source":"CNKI","title":"公职人员政治认同问卷编制及其与自我认同、心理弹性的关系研究","URL":"https://kns.cnki.net/kcms2/article/abstract?v=3uoqIhG8C475KOm_zrgu4lQARvep2SAkEcTGK3Qt5VuzQzk0e7M1zx0kT4kDCcRgNwaGlkhjheqGL3MFe75f4JLfhSpSd4IM&uniplatform=NZKPT","author":[{"literal":"彭婷"}],"accessed":{"date-parts":[["2023",3,9]]},"issued":{"date-parts":[["2019"]]}}},{"id":9432,"uris":["http://zotero.org/groups/4709411/items/EKQBB8KD"],"itemData":{"id":9432,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"该研究以国外学者Caglar Yildirim和Ana-Paula Correia于2015年编制的Nomophobia量表为基础,修订出了适用于国内的中文版无手机恐惧量表。研究首先使用探索性结构方程模型对量表结构进行初探;其次使用项目反应模型进行项...","container-title":"心理学探新","issue":"3","page":"247-253","source":"www.cqvip.com","title":"中文版无手机恐惧量表的修订","volume":"40","author":[{"family":"任世秀","given":""},{"family":"古丽给娜","given":""},{"family":"刘拓","given":""}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2020"]]}}}],"schema":"https://github.com/citation-style-language/schema/raw/master/csl-citation.json"}

(3)(+0000000): ITEM CSL_CITATION {"citationID":"sxl6Jexz","properties":{"formattedCitation":"(2022)","plainCitation":"(2022)","noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":9394,"uris":["http://zotero.org/groups/4709411/items/UMFRZCMB"],"itemData":{"id":9394,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"Critics of positive psychology have questioned the validity of positive psychological assessment measures (PPAMs), which negatively affects the credibility and public perception of the discipline. Psychometric evaluations of PPAMs have shown that various instruments produce inconsistent factor structures between groups/contexts/times frames, that their predictive validity is questionable, and that popular PPAMs are culturally biased. Further, it would seem positive psychological researchers prioritize date-model-ﬁt over measurement quality. To address these analytical challenges, more innovative and robust approaches toward the validation and evaluation of PPAMs are required to enhance the discipline’s credibility and to advance positive psychological science. Exploratory Structural Equation Modeling (ESEM) has recently emerged as a promising alternative to overcome some of these challenges by incorporating the best elements from exploratory- and conﬁrmatory factor analyses. ESEM is still a relatively novel approach, and estimating these models in statistical software packages can be complex and tedious. Therefore, the purpose of this paper is to provide novice researchers with a practical tutorial on how to estimate ESEM with a convenient online tool for Mplus. Speciﬁcally, we aim to demonstrate the use of ESEM through an illustrative example by using a popular positive psychological instrument: the Mental Health Continuum-SF. By using the MHC-SF as an example, we aim to provide (a) a brief overview of ESEM (and different ESEM models/approaches), (b) guidelines for novice researchers on how to estimate, compare, report, and interpret ESEM, and (c) a step-by-step tutorial on how to run ESEM analyses in Mplus with the De Beer and Van Zy ESEM syntax generator. The results of this study highlight the value of ESEM, over and above that of traditional conﬁrmatory factor analytical approaches. The results also have practical implications for measuring mental health with the MHC-SF, illustrating that a bifactor ESEM Model ﬁts the data signiﬁcantly better than any other theoretical model.","call-number":"4.157","container-title":"Frontiers in Psychiatry","DOI":"10.3389/fpsyt.2021.795672","ISSN":"1664-0640","journalAbbreviation":"Front. Psychiatry","language":"en","page":"795672","source":"3","title":"Exploratory Structural Equation Modeling: Practical Guidelines and Tutorial With a Convenient Online Tool for Mplus","title-short":"Exploratory Structural Equation Modeling","volume":"12","author":[{"family":"Zyl","given":"Llewellyn E.","non-dropping-particle":"van"},{"family":"Klooster","given":"Peter M.","non-dropping-particle":"ten"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2022"]]}},"label":"page","suppress-author":true}],"schema":"https://github.com/citation-style-language/schema/raw/master/csl-citation.json"}

(3)(+0000000): ITEM CSL_CITATION {"citationID":"9Tuga4vz","properties":{"formattedCitation":"(\\uc0\\u20110{}\\uc0\\u27915{} \\uc0\\u31561{}, 2021)","plainCitation":"(于洋 等, 2021)","noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":10202,"uris":["http://zotero.org/groups/4709411/items/8I4TDC8X"],"itemData":{"id":10202,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"[背景]工作场所的健康和安全氛围对职工身心健康具有重要影响,目前国内尚缺乏针对工作场所健康安全氛围的标准化评价工具。[目的]对健康安全氛围量表(Health and Safety Climate Survey)进行汉化并检验其信效度。[方法]通过翻译-回译-专家评议对英文版健康安全氛围量表进行汉化,选择2 600名采用配额抽样法抽取的上海市浦东新区16家企事业单位职工进行测试,检验中文版量表的信效度。效度评价选取结构、聚合和区分效度3个指标。结构效度采用探索性因子分析和验证性因子分析。探索性因子分析需结合各条目在所属维度上的因子载荷判断拟合情况,当因子载荷> 0.60,表示拟合结果良好。验证性因子分析中标准绝对适配度指标选用渐进残差均方和平方根(RMSEA),如其<0.05,表示适配度非常好;增值与简约适配度指标分别选用比较适配指数(CFI)和简约调整后的非规准适配度指数(PNFI),如其数值> 0.90,表示适配度非常好。聚合效度采用平均方差抽取量(AVE)评价,当AVE> 0.50时,表明聚合效度良好。区分效度用AVE的平方根是否大于潜变量间的相关系数来判断,若大于相关系数,则表示区分效度良好。信度评价选取内部一致性信度和组合信度2个指标,采用Cronbach’sα系数评价量表的内部一致性,若该值> 0.90,表示内部一致性非常好。Cronbach’sα系数在误差相关的情形下可能会造成信度低估,因此需结合结构方程模型计算组合信度系数(CR)进行综合评价,当CR> 0.70,表示组合信度良好。[结果]问卷有效回收率为95.69%。中文版健康安全氛围量表有22个条目,探索性因子分析提取了6个公因子,累计方差贡献率达74.79%。验证性因子分析得到修正后的RMSEA=0.045, PNFI=0.970,CFI=0.975,模型的整体适配理想。各维度的AVE均大于0.50,聚合效度理想。各两两维度之间的AVE的平方根均大于其相关系数,区分效度良好。总量表的Cronbach’sα系数为0.90,各维度的Cronbach’sα系数都在0.70以上,总量表的CR为0.93,各维度CR> 0.70,量表的总体信度良好。[结论]中文版健康安全氛围量表具有良好的信效度,可在实际应用中进一步完善。","container-title":"环境与职业医学","DOI":"10/grhnmj","ISSN":"2095-9982","issue":"11","language":"zh","page":"1214-1218","source":"CNKI","title":"健康安全氛围量表的信度与效度研究","volume":"38","author":[{"literal":"于洋"},{"literal":"戴俊明"},{"literal":"李晓梅"},{"literal":"沈奕峰"},{"literal":"扶雪莲"},{"literal":"陈苏虹"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2021"]]}}}],"schema":"https://github.com/citation-style-language/schema/raw/master/csl-citation.json"}

A Life-Career Rainbow is presented as a means of helping conceptualize multidimensional careers, the temporal involvement in, and the emotional commitment to, each role. Self-actualization in various roles, role conflicts, and the determinants of role selection and of role performance are discussed. \\uc0\\u29579{}\\uc0\\u28059{} \\uc0\\u31561{}, 2022)","plainCitation":"(Henseler et al., 2015; 于洋 等, 2021; 王涛 等, 2022)","noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":10296,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/MVTYPCGH"],"itemData":{"id":10296,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"稳定农村教师队伍是乡村振兴背景下发展学前教育的关键。本研究采用工作压力量表、工作冷漠感量表和离职倾向量表，抽样调查了10省22县（市）3 790名农村幼儿教师，分析了工作压力与工作冷漠感对离职倾向的影响。研究发现，工作压力能够显著预测教师离职倾向；工作冷漠感在工作压力和离职倾向之间起中介作用，且间接效应大于直接效应；编制身份能够调节工作压力对离职倾向的直接预测作用与工作冷漠感的中介作用。为降低农村幼儿教师离职倾向，需综合施策：将教师工作量控制在合理水平，提高教师综合待遇，创设友好的人文环境，保证教师编制充足供给。","container-title":"华东师范大学学报(教育科学版)","DOI":"10/grw5m5","ISSN":"1000-5560","issue":"6","language":"zh","page":"82-96","source":"CNKI","title":"乡村振兴背景下农村幼儿教师离职倾向的影响机制研究——基于有调节的中介效应分析","volume":"40","author":[{"literal":"王涛"},{"literal":"李梦琢"},{"literal":"刘善槐"},{"literal":"张雪"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2022"]]}}},{"id":10202,"uris":["http://zotero.org/groups/4709411/items/8I4TDC8X"],"itemData":{"id":10202,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"[背景]工作场所的健康和安全氛围对职工身心健康具有重要影响,目前国内尚缺乏针对工作场所健康安全氛围的标准化评价工具。[目的]对健康安全氛围量表(Health and Safety Climate Survey)进行汉化并检验其信效度。[方法]通过翻译-回译-专家评议对英文版健康安全氛围量表进行汉化,选择2 600名采用配额抽样法抽取的上海市浦东新区16家企事业单位职工进行测试,检验中文版量表的信效度。效度评价选取结构、聚合和区分效度3个指标。结构效度采用探索性因子分析和验证性因子分析。探索性因子分析需结合各条目在所属维度上的因子载荷判断拟合情况,当因子载荷> 0.60,表示拟合结果良好。验证性因子分析中标准绝对适配度指标选用渐进残差均方和平方根(RMSEA),如其<0.05,表示适配度非常好;增值与简约适配度指标分别选用比较适配指数(CFI)和简约调整后的非规准适配度指数(PNFI),如其数值> 0.90,表示适配度非常好。聚合效度采用平均方差抽取量(AVE)评价,当AVE> 0.50时,表明聚合效度良好。区分效度用AVE的平方根是否大于潜变量间的相关系数来判断,若大于相关系数,则表示区分效度良好。信度评价选取内部一致性信度和组合信度2个指标,采用Cronbach’sα系数评价量表的内部一致性,若该值> 0.90,表示内部一致性非常好。Cronbach’sα系数在误差相关的情形下可能会造成信度低估,因此需结合结构方程模型计算组合信度系数(CR)进行综合评价,当CR> 0.70,表示组合信度良好。[结果]问卷有效回收率为95.69%。中文版健康安全氛围量表有22个条目,探索性因子分析提取了6个公因子,累计方差贡献率达74.79%。验证性因子分析得到修正后的RMSEA=0.045, PNFI=0.970,CFI=0.975,模型的整体适配理想。各维度的AVE均大于0.50,聚合效度理想。各两两维度之间的AVE的平方根均大于其相关系数,区分效度良好。总量表的Cronbach’sα系数为0.90,各维度的Cronbach’sα系数都在0.70以上,总量表的CR为0.93,各维度CR> 0.70,量表的总体信度良好。[结论]中文版健康安全氛围量表具有良好的信效度,可在实际应用中进一步完善。","container-title":"环境与职业医学","DOI":"10/grhnmj","ISSN":"2095-9982","issue":"11","language":"zh","page":"1214-1218","source":"CNKI","title":"健康安全氛围量表的信度与效度研究","volume":"38","author":[{"literal":"于洋"},{"literal":"戴俊明"},{"literal":"李晓梅"},{"literal":"沈奕峰"},{"literal":"扶雪莲"},{"literal":"陈苏虹"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2021"]]}}},{"id":10330,"uris":["http://zotero.org/groups/4709411/items/HMLMMGPA"],"itemData":{"id":10330,"type":"article-journal","container-title":"Journal of the Academy of Marketing Science","DOI":"10/bbg4","ISSN":"0092-0703, 1552-7824","issue":"1","journalAbbreviation":"J. of the Acad. (3)(+0000000): ITEM CSL_CITATION {"citationID":"p9TYFBnM","properties":{"formattedCitation":"(\\uc0\\u26361{}\\uc0\\u21576{}\\uc0\\u26093{} \\uc0\\u31561{}, 2021; \\uc0\\u28201{}\\uc0\\u24544{}\\uc0\\u40607{} \\uc0\\u31561{}, 2004)","plainCitation":"(曹呈旭 等, 2021; 温忠麟 等, 2004)","noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":10198,"uris":["http://zotero.org/groups/4709411/items/P7AU6ECM"],"itemData":{"id":10198,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"目的编制大学生印象管理效能感量表(Impression Management Efficacy Scale, IMES)。方法在参考已有文献、开放式问卷调查和专家意见的基础上,以大学生为被试,共发放问卷1 379份,通过项目分析、探索性因素分析及信效度分析,最终编制出大学生印象管理效能感量表。结果 (1)探索性因素分析发现,大学生印象管理效能感量表由保护策略效能感量表(Defensive Strategy Efficacy Scale, DSES)、交流表达效能感量表(Communication Efficacy Scale, CES)和姿态呈现效能感量表(Appearance Posture Efficacy Scale, APES)3个维度共20个项目组成,累计方差贡献率为56.79%;(2)验证性因素分析表明,量表模型拟合良好(X~2/df=4.39, CFI=0.93, TLI=0.92, RMSEA=0.07)。同时,量表组合信度为0.97,平均方差抽取量为0.56;(3)信度检验发现,总量表及其各维度Cronbachα系数均在0.87以上,分半信度均在0.83以上,重测信度均在0.67以上。结论印象管理效能感量表具有较好的信效度,可用于大学生印象管理效能的测量。","container-title":"现代预防医学","ISSN":"1003-8507","issue":"17","language":"zh","page":"3199-3201+3225","source":"CNKI","title":"大学生印象管理效能感量表编制","volume":"48","author":[{"literal":"曹呈旭"},{"literal":"七十三"},{"literal":"金童林"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2021"]]}}},{"id":8389,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/KWG5JYSW"],"itemData":{"id":8389,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"讨论了Hu和Bentler（1998,1999）推荐的检验结构方程模型的 7个拟合指数准则 ,对这 7个指数的历史、特点和表现做了比较详细的述评。指出了他们基于这 7个指数的单指数准则和 2 -指数准则的不足之处。提出了超低显著性水平下的卡方准则 ,并部分重复他们的模拟例子 ,将卡方准则与这 7个指数准则比较 ,结果说明新的卡方准则优于其中的 6个 ,与另一个相当。最后简要说明了应当如何检视拟合指数进行模型检验和模型比较。","container-title":"心理学报","ISSN":"0439-755X","issue":"2","language":"zh-CN","note":"<北大核心, CSSCI>","page":"186-194","source":"CNKI","title":"结构方程模型检验:拟合指数与卡方准则","title-short":"结构方程模型检验","author":[{"literal":"温忠麟"},{"literal":"侯杰泰"},{"literal":"马什赫伯特"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2004"]]}}}],"schema":"https://github.com/citation-style-language/schema/raw/master/csl-citation.json"}

(3)(+0000000): ITEM CSL_CITATION {"citationID":"4Z5gTP4S","properties":{"formattedCitation":"(\\uc0\\u21016{}\\uc0\\u38182{}\\uc0\\u28304{}, 2008; \\uc0\\u21608{}\\uc0\\u26395{} \\uc0\\u31561{}, 2021)","plainCitation":"(刘锦源, 2008; 周望 等, 2021)","noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":10300,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/U5BTG68A"],"itemData":{"id":10300,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"在回顾图书馆服务质量测评当前研究状况的基础上,建立五维度(因子)的本土化图书馆服务质量模型,并证实存在高阶因子主宰五维度的表现。经过严谨的信度与效度检验,该模型不仅有效揭示图书馆服务质量测量的高阶因子结构关系,而且可以确定测量指标对各因子的影响程度。据此,将图书馆服务质量指数化,为其改进提供依据。","container-title":"图书情报工作","ISSN":"0252-3116","issue":"1","language":"zh","page":"93-96","source":"CNKI","title":"图书馆服务质量的本土化模型：高阶因子结构与测量","author":[{"literal":"刘锦源"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2008"]]}}},{"id":10302,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/EIHAIQR6"],"itemData":{"id":10302,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"居民参与社区治理对于打造共建共治共享的社会治理格局具有重要意义。通过提升社区公共空间的儿童友好度来促进居民参与社区治理,为学术界和实务界所倡导和探索,但对应的实证研究仍鲜见。基于已有文献和理论分析,我们构建了社区公共空间儿童友好度影响居民参与社区治理的假设模型,运用结构方程模型,以T市H区为分析对象,探索社区公共空间儿童友好度、居民交往与居民参与之间的影响路径与机制。研究发现,社区公共空间儿童友好度可以解构为空间舒适性、空间安全性、空间互动性三个层次,其中空间安全性的影响程度最高;其次,社区公共空间儿童友好度对居民参与有显著的正向影响,提升社区公共空间儿童友好度能够直接或通过推动居民交往间接促进居民参与社区治理;最后,父母偏好在上述效应中具有调节作用,高父母偏好群体与低父母偏好群体的调节作用存在显著差异,其中高父母偏好群体中社区公共空间儿童友好度对居民交往、居民参与社区治理的正向影响效果更为显著。这些研究发现充分肯定了以儿童为纽带、以家庭为支点社区治理策略的积极作用,为进一步助推居民参与社区治理提供了更多的政策创新思路。即从推进儿童友好理念下的社区公共空间更新来展开内部优化,从强化父母对儿童进入社区公共空间活动的正向预期来展开外部调节,在内外部双向增益的过程中提升居民参与社区治理的水平。","container-title":"深圳社会科学","ISSN":"2096-983X","issue":"6","language":"zh","page":"82-94","source":"CNKI","title":"社区公共空间儿童友好度影响居民参与社区治理的实证研究","volume":"4","author":[{"literal":"周望"},{"literal":"焉超越"},{"literal":"董欣滢"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2021"]]}}}],"schema":"https://github.com/citation-style-language/schema/raw/master/csl-citation.json"}

(3)(+0000000): ITEM CSL_CITATION {"citationID":"gDXMAS6g","properties":{"formattedCitation":"(\\uc0\\u21608{}\\uc0\\u26395{} \\uc0\\u31561{}, 2021)","plainCitation":"(周望 等, 2021)","noteIndex":0},"citationItems":[{"id":10302,"uris":["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/EIHAIQR6"],"itemData":{"id":10302,"type":"article-journal","abstract":"居民参与社区治理对于打造共建共治共享的社会治理格局具有重要意义。通过提升社区公共空间的儿童友好度来促进居民参与社区治理,为学术界和实务界所倡导和探索,但对应的实证研究仍鲜见。基于已有文献和理论分析,我们构建了社区公共空间儿童友好度影响居民参与社区治理的假设模型,运用结构方程模型,以T市H区为分析对象,探索社区公共空间儿童友好度、居民交往与居民参与之间的影响路径与机制。研究发现,社区公共空间儿童友好度可以解构为空间舒适性、空间安全性、空间互动性三个层次,其中空间安全性的影响程度最高;其次,社区公共空间儿童友好度对居民参与有显著的正向影响,提升社区公共空间儿童友好度能够直接或通过推动居民交往间接促进居民参与社区治理;最后,父母偏好在上述效应中具有调节作用,高父母偏好群体与低父母偏好群体的调节作用存在显著差异,其中高父母偏好群体中社区公共空间儿童友好度对居民交往、居民参与社区治理的正向影响效果更为显著。这些研究发现充分肯定了以儿童为纽带、以家庭为支点社区治理策略的积极作用,为进一步助推居民参与社区治理提供了更多的政策创新思路。即从推进儿童友好理念下的社区公共空间更新来展开内部优化,从强化父母对儿童进入社区公共空间活动的正向预期来展开外部调节,在内外部双向增益的过程中提升居民参与社区治理的水平。","container-title":"深圳社会科学","ISSN":"2096-983X","issue":"6","language":"zh","page":"82-94","source":"CNKI","title":"社区公共空间儿童友好度影响居民参与社区治理的实证研究","volume":"4","author":[{"literal":"周望"},{"literal":"焉超越"},{"literal":"董欣滢"}],"issued":{"date-parts":[["2021"]]}}}],"schema":"https://github.com/citation-style-language/schema/raw/master/csl-citation.json"}

BA\u5E94\u5F53\u591A\u53C2\u52A0\u793E\u4EA4\u6D3B\u52A8\u548C\u4F53\u80B2\u953B\u70BC,\u5B50\u5973\u5E94\u5BF9\u8001\u4EBA\u591A\u4E00\u4E9B\u966A\u4F34,\u56FD\u5BB6\u5728\u5EF6\u8FDF\u9000\u4F11\u5E74\u9F84\u7684\u540C\u65F6\u8981\u5173\u6CE8\u8001\u5E74\u4EBA\u5BF9\u5DE5\u4F5C\u7684\u6EE1\u610F\u5EA6,\u5173\u6CE8\u8001\u5E74\u4EBA\u7684\u7CBE\u795E\u751F\u6D3B\u3002", 'container-title':"\u4E2D\u534E\u62A4\u7406\u6742\u5FD7", ISSN:"0254-1769", issue:"11", language:"zh", page:"1294-1297", source:"CNKI", title:"\u4E2D\u6587\u7248Kogan\u8001\u5E74\u6001\u5EA6\u91CF\u8868\u7684\u4FEE\u8BA2\u7814\u7A76", volume:"49", author:[{literal:"\u5218\u4E91\u5A25"}, {literal:"\u6768\u6587\u4E3D"}, {literal:"\u9A6C\u8273\u6797"}, {literal:"Alison While"}, {literal:"\u53F6\u6587\u7434"}, {literal:"\u9648\u6D01"}], issued:{'date-parts':[["2014"]]}}}, {id:9639, uris:["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/T28EPT7W"], itemData:{id:9639, type:"article-journal", abstract:"Population ageing is one of the present and future challenges in the European context. In addition to age-related changes, negative and judicious attitudes by society are also prevalent. Therefore, there is a need for reliable instruments to evaluate attitudes toward ageing. In this vein, the present research aims to provide a reliable version of the Kogan's Attitudes toward Older People scale adapted to the Spanish context. In a sample from the academic community (N\u2009=\u2009163), we evaluated the reliability, the psychometric properties, and the internal consistency of a version of Kogan's scale translated into Spanish. The results showed a reliable short version of the scale with adequate psychometric properties and two factors: positive and negative. Moreover, the correlates with similar measures of attitude toward older people proved external validity measures by the short scale. The implications and contributions to the geriatric population are discussed.", 'call-number':"2", 'container-title':"Archives of Gerontology and Geriatrics", DOI:"10/grv35f", ISSN:"1872-6976", journalAbbreviation:"Arch Gerontol Geriatr", language:"en", note:"PMID: 32629373", page:"104159", source:"4.163", title:"Kogan's Attitude toward Old People scale revisited: Psychometric properties and recommendations", 'title-short':"Kogan's Attitude toward Old People scale revisited", volume:"90", author:[{family:"Ortiz-Rubio", given:"Araceli"}, {family:"Lobato", given:"Roberto M."}, {family:"Valenza", given:"Marie Carmen"}], issued:{'date-parts':[["2020"]]}}}, {id:9646, uris:["http://zotero.org/users/9278983/items/7W56V75Z"], itemData:{id:9646, type:"article-journal", abstract:"Background\nTaiwan is facing the dilemma of a rapidly growing elderly population and there is a perceived need for greater gerontological education. Several universities have recently started providing elective gerontological certification programs. In order to provide useful and sufficient information to increase students\u2019 knowledge and attitudes, to develop a reliable and valid instrument is essential and helpful for faculty as well as the program director to pinpoint students\u2019 strengths and weaknesses.\nObjective\nTo assess the reliability and validity of a Chinese version of Kogan's Attitudes toward Older People (KAOP) among medical and nursing students at a medical university.\nMethod\nA two-phase data collection design was used. Two weeks following the first completion, another KAOP form, was given. Content validity, construct validity, internal consistency, and stability reliability were assessed. The final sample consisted of 275 students.\nResults\nScores were between 34 and 238. The study sample reported slightly positive attitudes (144.3\xB117.89), with half of the subjects (50.1%) above average. All of the 34 items were found to have significant item-to-total correlations (p<.05). Two factors were extracted, Appreciation and Prejudice. The Prejudice and Appreciation contributed 33.6% and 21.1% to the variance. The Cronbach's alpha was .82 for the total scale (.83 for Prejudice, .81 for Appreciation). Stability was 0.86 for Prejudice and 0.91 for Appreciation.\nConclusions\nThe Chinese version of the KAOP can be considered reliable and valid scale for assessing the attitudes toward older people.", 'call-number':"1", 'container-title':"International Journal of Nursing Studies", DOI:"10/b9x379", ISSN:"0020-7489", issue:"1", journalAbbreviation:"International Journal of Nursing Studies", language:"en", page:"38-44", source:"6.612", title:"A Chinese version of Kogan's Attitude toward Older People Scale: Reliability and validity assessment", 'title-short':"A Chinese version of Kogan's Attitude toward Older People Scale", volume:"46", author:[{family:"Yen", given:"Chi-Hua"}, {family:"Liao", given:"Wen-Chun"}, {family:"Chen", given:"Yu-Ru"}, {family:"Kao", given:"Min-Chen"}, {family:"Lee", given:"Meng-Chih"}, {family:"Wang", given:"Cheng-Ching"}], issued:{'date-parts':[["2009", 1, 1]]}}}], schema:"https://github.com/citation-style-language/schema/raw/master/csl-citation.json"}), [["A4SHl5yv", 0], ["NK6Aj9WV", 0], ["CBvbM7oh", 0], ["4vvEuvf0", 0], ["OY7za2Sy", 0], ["mKIiUF6J", 0], ["owELccFI", 0], ["MFGgZDMv", 0], ["m2aDgFWB", 0], ["JepMTqoO", 0], ["Q5cmNGcy", 0], ["vCjZUc9l", 0], ["osGsKPLA", 0], ["OLZgiFzK", 0], ["0EX9jN8M", 0], ["jENgfQda", 0], ["XdiFK1R3", 0], ["uXnA5ttT", 0], ["JqaKepWR", 0], ["Y4jafsHn", 0], ["ezH313WA", 0], ["cVQkBJXI", 0]], []
